112112.content:
Sadly near all of you're predictions about you're kids had started coming true. Within the first year they had grown, a lot. Both children were easily 10-15ft tall and sadly that made them consider you more as a toy rather then as a father which really saddened you. Thus although you didn't like it you spent a lot of time away from them and Mihal, you walked into her chamber and looking around you didn't see Kevin or Yasmin, you climbed up and froze as Mihal was breast-feeding them. "Oh my king, where have you been these past few days?" she asks as you hadn't seen her in a week.

"Just exploring our kingdom, i'm not too familiar with it" you say which was true but only a half truth.

"You're hiding something, I can smell the hesitation on you" Mihal says. "Come up and sit with me" she says.

"I'm good" you reply staying at the foot of the bed. Mihal notices this, "do you not, like me anymore my king?" she asks.

"No, no" you reply quickly. You sigh, "look Mihal it's the kids, they're what twice, thrice my size, all they see me as is a toy, not a father" you say looking downcast. You look up and Mihal's just staring at you, she waits till the kids are done before gently putting them down, one on each pillow. Mihal craws across the bed and gently picks you up, "my king, i'm sorry I wasn't paying enough attention to see" she says hugging you to her breast.

"It's ok Mihal, you were taking care of the kids that's the important thing" you say. She hugs you tighter, "no it isn't, our children need to know you're their father, not a toy" Mihal says sternly, "you are the one I love and no one else will father my children" she says lifting you up and giving you a quick lick.

"Blech, I thought I told you to stop doing that" you say.

"But it shows that I love you" she says.

"Humans do that by kissing not licking" you say. Mihal nuzzles you then kisses you gently, "better?" she asks.

"Much" you reply. You heard the sound of crying and Mihal quickly puts you down and picks up you're children gently cradling each in an arm. They stop and both look toward you and start making grabbing motions, you back up but Mihal holds you in place with her tail. "Yasmin, Kevin stop it this is you're father, this is daddy" Mihal says moving towards you, you try to move back again but you're still blocked. Yasmin falls onto the bed and crawls toward you, in the past she'd grab onto you, hard, she even tried to bite you once, so yeah you did have so animosity for you're own kids. Yasmin looked at you face to face and her eyes looked different it was like there was, recognition now that Mihal had identified you as their father. She crawls forward and much to you're suprise instead of just grabbing you or something she wraps herself around you and tries to bury herself into you're chest. You tentativley wrap you're arms around her and move her head onto you're shoulder, she gives off what you can only equate to a sigh and much to you're and Mihal's shock says "daddy" before laying her head down and letting her weight go pinning you under her.

"Her...her first word" Mihal says fighting back tears, Kevin falls onto the bed and crawls over, he lies out next to his sister.

"You've got to be kidding me" you say sighing.

"What's wrong?" Mihal asks.

"Mihal, they identified you as alpha, so thus, since you never acknowledged my presence as that of you're mate before them they never acknowleged me as their father" you say.

"So...it's my fault?" she asks.

"Yeah, but don't worry about it" you say. Mihal tries to pull Yasmin off you but she actually wraps herself tighter around you, so much so you have to push her off a bit as she was cutting off you're air. Finally Mihal opted to rest you on her chest with Yasmin near you and she held Kevin up near her collarbone. You looked up at Mihal, "I am sorry, for causing you all this trouble" she says.

"It's okay Mihal, now that it's solved we can go back to fully being a family" you say.

"Did...did you ever think of leaving me and the children because of this?" Mihal asks.

"I wasn't going to leave, but I was going to become only a small part of their lives till they were like 4 or 5" you say. Kevin by now had fallen back asleep and Mihal was tightly curled up around you again, Mihal gently pulls you up and starts gently stroking you're back. "I'm sorry Jake, i'm such a troublesome wife" she says.

"Stop apologizing, it's ok you're worth all the trouble in the world anyways" you say laying you're head down on her breast. You were sure Mihal was smiling, "why don't you take a nap along with the kids, it might do you some good" she says.

"Alright, as long as I get to wake up to you're beautiful smile" you say. Mihal laid a hand over you and Yasmin and started humming, you were soon asleep. While you slept you had a dream, in the dream you were laying on Mihal's stomach as she laid in the middle of a giant grass field. Laying next to her was Yasmin on her right and Kevin on her left and they were both grown up, the thing is for some reason in you're dream when Kevin was grown up, he looked like a well giant anthro red fox, no part of him was left as human. You're dream self ignored it but you filed the information awake. Suddenly you were shaken awake, you look up and it was late afternoon from what you could tell, Mihal was looking at you worried, "ugghh...what's up?" you ask. She moves Kevin over to you and gently licks him once, "he...he has a fever and it's almost like he's growing fur" Mihal says. You walk over and inspect you're son, indeed there was way too much hair on him for really any human and it was all red. Kevin turned and stared at you weakly, "daddy" he says, You smiled, "don't worry Kevin we'll get you fixed up" you say.

"Mihal, I need you to get some cool towels, and then get the doctor for me" you say. Mihal gets up and runs off returning in a minute with the towels before running off to get the doctor. You grab one and drag it over placing it on Kevin's head, Yasmin crawls over and stares at her brother for a bit before grabbing you, "daddy" she says the fear easily detectable in her voice. "Don't worry Yasmin, Kevin will be ok" you say. The doctor soon shows up and much to you're shock she ushers you out of the room, "hey why do I have to leave?" you protest. "I am going to be doing some very, strange procedures, so it is best you're not here" she says shutting the door in you're face. You wander the halls for a 4,5,6,7,8 hours, soon the doctor has been there an entire day and you've nearly worried yourself to death. You were just wandering the halls to the kitchen when the cheetah anthro that helped deliver the twins runs up. "My liege, the doctor requests you're presence" she says. You nod and run after her, she however gets impatient after 10 seconds and just scoops you up and runs back herself. You push the door open a crack and walk inside, you can't see anything so you climb up onto the bed. Sitting there was the doctor and Mihal, there were looking down at a bundle, fearing the worse you run up and freeze, Kevin was lying there thankfully still breathing, but every trace of him being human had disappeared. He had paws instead of hands and feet like everyone else and the lower part of his face had become a muzzle as well as there were now ears on the top of his head and a tail sticking out of his now furry butt.

"I'm sorry" Mihal says.

"Sorry for what?" you ask.

"Well now you have no reminder of home" she says.

"Mihal it's ok, are there any problems with him?" you ask.

"None that I can find" the doctor says.

"That's good you reply. Within a few minutes the doctor had left and you were curled up between Mihal's breasts with Kevin and Yasmin laying one on either side of you. Mihal started humming and you were able to stay awake until she fell asleep before falling asleep yourself.
112112.title: A year later

choices: "Today is the day of the Life Festival!"
1121121.content:
The next day, you woke up feeling much happier, now that your children saw you as their father. Kevin and Yasmin were still asleep, and so was Mihal. Kevin seemed to not really have a problem with being a full fox now. He lay there, curled up, sucking his thumb as he slept. You smiled. At least you didn't have to worry about him getting cold.

You made your way off of Mihal, and climbed down the side of the bed. You slip on a silk robe Mihal had made for you, then make your way to the throne room. You decide to wait until Mihalk wakes up to eat. You always have your meals together. Leaning against Mihal's throne is a ladder, that goes up to the throne's armrest. On the armrest is a miniature throne for you. Indeed, many changes have been made to accomodate you being the new king.

You climb up the latter and sit on your throne. A few of the other amazons walk by and talk to you. Saying how their own children are doing, etc. You have more than doubled the island's population, and made the other inhabitants very happy. You lost track of exactly how many sons and daughters you have, not that you see them much.

Later, Mihal comes in, dressed in her usual attire, and kisses you good morning. "Good morning, my love!" She says. She seems happier than usual today. "Good morning." You reply, hugging her nose. She carries you into the dinning hall and sits you on the table in front of her. The servants bring you your breakfast, more of that spicy meat, eggs, ( donated by the local bird girls), and milk (from the cows.) Of course the food is much too large for you to finish, so you eat what you can and Mihal eats the rest.

When you both finish eating she looks down at you, smiling. "What are you so happy about?" You ask. "You don't know?" She says.
1121121.title: Next morning

11211211.content: "Really?". You never saw the time pass. It was more than a year since you arrive on the island. "Yes .. the day we met. You had been too afraid of me, huh?". Mihal asks. "Hey, I don't get so scared." You reply. "Really ...?". She says, giggling. "Okay ... I might have been scared, but it was not because I knew i was going to fall for you."You smile at her. She smiles and gently picks you up. "I love you so much!" You tell her, pressing yourself against her chest. "I love you too."She reponds, returning the hug. Suddenly, from nowhere, you start feeling bad, a feeling that something bad will happen. "Honey, something wrong?" Mihal questions, looking at you. "Oh, nothing, nothing .... " You respond, not wanting to worry her. "I pressed you too much?". "No, of course not. " She puts you on the ground.
11211211.title: "It's our anniversary!"

11211212.content:
"What Life Festival?" You ask, confused. "Oh, right, you don't know." Said Mihal. "You see, long ago, Mushana, the goddess of love and fertility, granted us a great blessing. She created a fountain on this island that would renew the youth of anyone who drinks from it." You couldn't believe what you were hearing. "So you're saying the Fountain of Youth is on this island?" You ask, astonished.


"If you want to call it that, yes." replies Mihal. "So, every ten years we hold a great celebration, in honor of Mushana. Everyone on the island drinks from the fountain, and the stay their current age for the next ten years. I myself look like I'm in my twenties, when in reality, I am 237."


"You're that old!?" You exclaim. "Oh yes." She says. "You don't mind do you?" A look of worry suddenly came to her face. "Not at all." You say quickly. "I would love you if you were as old as time itself." She bends down and kisses you. "Thank you." She says, smiling.


"Of course," She continues. "The children don't drink from the fountain until they are a certain age. We wouldn't want to have to take care of them their entire lives. Granted, the fountain doesn't make us immortal. We can still die, but it lets us retain our youth and beauty. After wards, after everyone has taken a drink, there is a grand party. You'll just love it!"


You ponder what she said. First, you become king of an island of amazons, now, you can be young forever! "Sounds wonderful!"You say. "Totally looking forward to it!" After breakfast, Mihal puts you on her shoulder, and heads outside the palace. "Wait, what about Kevin and Yasmin?" You say. "Don't worry." Says Mihal. "The servants are watching them. I'd bring them with, but I can't risk them getting into the fountain yet. The servants will come to the fountain to drink later."


She steps outside the palace, to a crowd of what looks like the entire island. "The time has come to renew our youth and beauty!" announces, and the crowd cheers. "Everyone to the fountain!" The crowd parts as Mihal walks through them, and they follow her out of the city into the jungle.


Eventually Mihal stops and lifts you to her face. "Now, on the ground below me is a cave. In that cave lies the fountain. Follow everyone inside, there is a golden chalice that must be drunken from for the fountain to work. Wait for everyone to take and drink, then fill the chalice and bring it out to me, so that I may drink from it." You nod and she lower you to the ground.


You follow the crowd of amazons into the cave. Torches line the walls, lighting the path. When you reach the fountain chamber, you are awed. Three quarters of the chamber, which is the size of football field, is taken up by the fountain, but that's not what awes you.


The bottom of them basin of the fountain is made of gold, making the water appear golden as well. In the center of the basin is a golden statue of a anthro lioness, with a rose in one hand and a spear in the other. That must be Mushana. Some of the amazons in the crowd carried baskets full of flower petals, which they begins tossing around into the air.


In front of the fountain is the gold chalice. To the amazons it's the size of a normal cup, but to you, it's as big as a bucket. One of the amazons, a panther girl, steps forward. She picks up the chalice and dips it into the fountain. She brings it to her lips and drinks. She licks her lips, turns, and gives the chalice to the amazon behind her.


You stand to the side until everyone has taken a drink, then you pick up the chalice by both grips on its sides, and fill it in the pool. You follow the crowd out of the cave, sometimes struggling with the chalice, the water sloshing about onto you and the floor. You finally come out of the cave. Mihal lifts you and the chalice up to her mouth. "If you would?" She opens her mouth and you dump the chalice in.


"Now, before you drink from the fountain, there's something you should know." Mihal warns. "Once you drink, you must continue to drink from the font every ten years exactly. If you don't all the years you didn't age will catch up to you at once. Do it for so long, and miss one drink, and you could instantly age into dust. Do you accept this?"
11211212.title: "Today is the day of the Life Festival!"

112112121.content:
"I Accept." you say.
You drink from the chalice.

The citizens cheer and soon everyone drinks from the fountain.

"Happy Festival of Life everyone." you say.
112112121.title: Accept

1121122.content:
It had been roughly a year after the incident with Kevin, the kingdom had thankfully not reacted too negatively to him becoming full anthro, in fact they welcomed it which bugged you a little bit but not too much. You woke up in your usual place, snuggled within Mihal's chest for a while Kevin and Yasmin had slept around you, actually that was the only way they'd fall asleep is if you were nearby but as they kept growing it became very apparent after Yasmin accidentally crushed something about the thickness of your arm it would be better that you stopped sleeping near them. Much crying and whining later Mihal had come up with the solution you would sleep in her cleavage while Kevina and Yasmin could sleep attached in her arms. You heard a giggle as you woke up and you fell a bit landing on your back "sorry my king did I wake you?" Mihal says.

You stand up and look up at her and stretch "yeah, but it's ok, just means I get to see more of my beautiful queen" you reply. Despite the fact the 2 of you had been married for 2 years Mihal still blushes at the comment and lowers a hand which you climb onto. "You are just the sweetest my little king" she says gently nuzzling you and then kissing the top of your head. You pet the tip of her muzzle and smile up at her when you heard a voice "daddy" it says. Mihal looks down and Yasmin in her pink gown was looking up at the 2 of you, Mihal lowers her hand and Yasmin gently hugs you and snuggles you "daddy" she says happily.

"Good morning darling" you say petting her cheek, Yasmin sighs and tries to go back to sleep clutching you but Mihal gently pulls you from her grasp, Yasmin looks up at her mother and sticks her tongue at her "daddy back" she says jumping up and down reaching but she can't reach you. "Sorry Yasmin, but you and Kevin will be able to play with daddy when you learn to fully control your size" Mihal says putting you on top of her head. Mihal looks up at you longingly and you sigh, "Mihal can you let me down for a bit?" you say. Mihal gently puts you down and you walk over to Yasmin, she bends over and you gently pet your daughter's cheek and hug her. "That's my good girl, your such a cutie Yasmin" you say. She giggles and pushes you over with her muzzle probably wanting to just curl up and go back to sleep with you. "Yasmin stop" you say and she freezes and you stand up, "Yasmin you need to learn that you can't lay on top of me otherwise you'll hurt Daddy understand?" you say.

Suprisingly she nods and lays out on her side and you lay near her, her paws and arms encircling you "I love you Daddy" she whispers kissing your head.

"I love you too Yasmin" you say. She quickly falls back asleep and Mihal pulls you out of her grasp.

"I knew you'd be the perfect father for my children" Mihal says happily nuzzling you. Your stomach rumbles and she giggles "I think it's about time we went for breakfast" she says. You nod and Mihal exits the room, Sara and Clara, Kevin and Yasmin's caretakers run into the room as they leave just in case the kids wake up. Mihal briskly walks through the hall, being greeted by everyone she passes, no one could see you as you were right in the center of her head. Mihal walks to the dining hall and sits down in her chair gently taking you off her head and putting you down in the right next to hers. She picks up a bell about the size of a church bell and gently rings it, from about 4 different corridors run 4 cat anthros who expertly jump and get to the top of the table and in front of Mihal in a second. "Yes your majesty, what would you like for breakfast" a tabby by the name of Kim asks.

"I think some eggs would be good today thank you, as well as some milk and some meat" she says. The head cat points and the other 3 jump off the table and run off to get the food, Kim walks up and bows to you. "What would you like today my liege?" she says.

You scowl "didn't I tell you to stop calling me that" you say.

She nods "I'm sorry my king but it feels strange calling you by name" she says. You sigh "fine fine, whatever, i'll have the same thing" you say. She nods "Tara is doing quite well" she says before running off to get your food. You were glad that everyone had at least taken one of your orders to heart, everytime you saw someone you wanted an update on how your daughters were doing be it you saw them once a year or once a day. In a few minutes a team of anthros come in carrying 2 silver plates and a glass filled with milk, Mihal bends over and lifts each of the plates up as well as the glass, she smiles at them "thank you for the hard work" she says. The anthros bow and run off, you turn as there is a clank in front of you from Kim setting your plates and glass down, "breakfast as you ordered my liege" she says kneeling. You sighed and stared at her "Kim what was my order" you say.

She fidgets for a second but doesn't raise her head, "to call you by name my liege" she says.

You nod "good now are you going to do it?" you ask. You weren't going to force any of them but you really preferred to be called by name.

Kim fidgets again and sighs "breakfast as ordered Jake" she says but you saw a smile play on the edges of her lips. You stand up and she stays kneeling as you walk up and pet her head "thank you Kim" you say. She gently starts to purr and gently pushes against you "anything for you Jake" she says fully opening up to using your name. You heard a cough and Kim looks up at Mihal and quickly bows "I must get back to my duties" she says scampering off the table and down a corridor.

"Someone's getting a little too friendly with people" Mihal says a warning tone in her voice.

"Sorry Mihal" you say taking your seat "I guess I just don't know the where the line is" you say. Mihal giggles and plucks you from your chair lifting you up to face height she gently kisses you "that is why I'm here my king" she says. Mihal places you back down in your place and starts eating, soon the mood between the 2 of you lightened and the hall was filled with Mihal's laughter. Soon breakfast was finished and anthros came to remove the plates, Kim was nice enough this time to call you by name and you nodded at her approvingly. Mihal lifts you up and walks back to the throne room. She puts you down in the little groove carved into the top of her chair which had a throne your size added to it. You didn't think you were above Mihal but she insisted you be close and actually chose the spot herself saying that if you were to fall she could catch you or at the very least you'd fall onto her. The builders couldn't exactly argue with her because well she was the queen and her logic was sound, although it did take them a while to get your throne set up. You walked up and took the small crown off the seat and put it on, it still didn't really feel right though, you just didn't consider yourself royalty even though you were married to a 300ft tall vixen queen. Your inner thoughts were interrupted as.....
1121122.title: Skip ahead another year

choices: Follow the week leading up to the trial
11211222.content:
The doors to the throne room open, and in runs a black panther anthro. She runs up to Mihal's feet and kneels, head bowed. "My queen! Please, forgive me! It wasn't my fault!" She began talking very fast, nearly hyperventilating. Mihal raised a hand. "Calm down! Now, calmly tell me what is wrong."


The panther took a deep breath, then sighed. "I beg you my liege. Forgive me. I can't keep it a secret anymore." She stared up at you and pointed. "It was him!"


"What was him?" Asked Mihal. "I.......I.......I've been having an affair with him." The panther admits. "What!?" Exclaims Mihal. She reaches up and grabs you from your throne, holding you in front of her face. "Is this true?" She demands.


"Of course not!" You say. "I would never cheat on you! You're the only one I love!" "He's lying!" Says the panther. "Smell him! My scent is on him!" Mihal sniffs you. "She's right!" Mihal's fist tightens around you, and you struggle to get free. "How could you!?" She says, hear voice cracking, tears forming in her eyes.


"Mihal.......please........." You gasp. but she ignores you. "What is your name?' She turns to the panther. "Jengra, my liege." Says the panther. "I couldn't live with it any longer. He has been sneaking out of the palace to visit me for the past few weeks. He said that he really loved me, and that he planned to poison you, so he could choose me as the new queen. I couldn't stand the thought of betraying you anymore. So I came to confess, in hopes that you would forgive me."


"It's not true!" You say, but your pleas fall on deaf ears. "You made a wise decision." Says Mihal. "Stealing one's mate is punishable by death, and so is treason. Therefore, there will be a trial one week from today, to determine his innocence. You are to be there to present your case, understand?"


"Yes, my queen." Says Jengra, bowing. "Thank you, oh merciful one." She turns and leaves. Mihal turns to you with a snarl. "You're coming with me." She says angrily. She stands up and carries you back to the bedroom. There, the caretakers are tending to Kevin and Yasmin.


"You two, take Kevin and Yasmin out of here, I need to talk to my husband in private." The caretakers bow and do as Mihal says, carrying the children out of the room. Mihal holds you in front of her face. "YOU BASTARD! HOW COULD YOU!?" The wind from her yelling feels like a typhoon, as it nearly blows you out of her hand.


"Mihal please, listen to me!" You plead. "You know I would never betray you like this! How can you believe those lies?" "Her scent was on you! Explain that!" Mihal counters. She has you there.


"I don't know how that got there. But you have to believe me, someone is framing me!" Mihal turns her head away, tears streaming down her face. "I wish I could. What about the children? How will they react to this?" Mihal reaches under the bed and pulls out what to her would be a small birdcage, but to you, it's as big as your old apartment.


She places you inside the cage and locks the door. "You will stay there until the trial. I pray that you are innocent, I suggest you do the same." She hangs the cage from a hook in the ceiling, suspending you in the air. Then she buries her face in the bed pillows and cries. You stare down at her from your hanging prison, heartbroken.


How could this have happened? Who was doing this, and why? Whatever punishment was in store for you if found guilty, it couldn't be worse than watching Mihal like this.


Eventually, Mihal stopped crying and left the room, leaving you there. She didn't come back until later that night, carrying Kevin and Yasmin in her arms. "Daddy bad?" Ask Yasmin upon seeing you in your cage. "Yes. daddy has done something very wrong, and is being punished." Says Mihal as she lays down with them next to her.


Soon, their snores fills the room. You lay there staring at the roof of your cage. "Whoever is doing this, they're gonna pay." You think to yourself before you finally fall asleep.


(By the way, I'm aware that Mihal let Jake mate with every female on the island, but that was for re-population. She's mad now because he is only supposed to mate with her now. This affair supposedly happened out of lust for another female, not for population. Just thought I'd clear that up.)
11211222.title: The Plot Thickens

choices: You wake up on Mihal's chest with Yasmine and Kevin
You wake up in a medical bed
112112221.content:
The cage rattled and swung knocking you from sleep, you looked up to see Mihal carrying the cage at her side as she walked from her bedroom to the throne room where the trial would happen. You winced as your last resort poked against your chest and you held it tight to keep it from moving. You were stunned as Mihal enter the room as it looked like the entire island apart from Yasmine and Kevin were there since Mihal wouldn't let them watch the trial. Mihal walks to the center of the room and puts your cage down harshly almost letting it fall before walking up to her throne and sitting down.

"Jake you have been charged with treason as well as adultery, how do you plead?" she says.

"Not guilty" you reply timidly as Mihal was very scary when she was angry.

Mihal gestures at the crowd and Jengera steps forward and bows before Mihal "your majesty for weeks now he has been visiting me in my bedroom saying how I was a much better lover and more beautiful then you are. I am sorry your Majesty but I couldn't resist his kind words" she says.

Mihal stares down at you "how do you respond?" she asks.

"I didn't do it, Mihal I've fallen asleep next to you for the past 2 years, how can you believe this" you say staring up at her pleading. Mihal's eyes soften for a second before hardening "How do you explain her scent then" she shouts and again you still can't come up with an answer.

Mihal stares down at you and takes your silence as an admission of guilt "very well, you have been found guilty of treason as well as adultery, your punishment is death, and since I am your wife, I'll do it" she says going from almost growling to sounding like she was on the verge of tears. There was a gasp from everyone assembled, some had thought you had actually done what you were charged but no one thought you deserved death.

You stared up at Mihal as she stood up and pulled out what you were holding, it was a claw shaving, one of Mihal's sharpened to a fine point. Mihal lifted up the cage and stared at you "what is that?" she asks angry.

You stare at her and smile "Mihal, you won't believe me, I'm sorry, I can't die by your hand, I won't let you carry that burden, I love you, take good care of Kevin and Yasmine" you say before you stab the claw shaving into your chest. You feel your own blood start to flow out and there's a scream before your vision blurs and black out.

(I know you couldn't see this next part because you're unconcious but let's just assume you can)

Mihal stared down at your body blood trickling from the self-inflicted wound with the shaving sticking out, she lowers the cage and opens the door quickly "Doctor" she shouts and out of the crowd run 2 anthros a cat and a dog. They run right past Mihal and lift you up and turn you over so the blood won't just fall out as they run off. Mihal turns as there is laughing and it came from Jengera and she was staring at Mihal laughing her head off. "I can't believe it, the fool killed himself, it would have been much better if your majesty had in fact purged him instead, but this works just as well" she says. She freezes as Mihal stands up and quickly grabs her lifting Jengera lifting her to her face. "What did you do?" Mihal says growling and squeezing the panther in her hand.

"Your majesty, he was a taint, he made us unpure, now we are a pure anthronian race once again, now that we can sustain ourselves" Jengera gasps out. Mihal stared down at the panther and actually dropped her, Jengera fell to the floor below and everyone assembled heard a crack as a few of her bones broke as she hit the floor. "Guards take her away but makes sure she stays alive, I want to know if there are more in on this" Mihal says as 2 guards and 2 more doctors run out of the crowd and lift up Jengera. Mihal steps over them and runs after the 2 anthros that took you.

(Alright back to you)

You felt like you were in darkness before you felt a sharp pain in your chest. "Ok, pain is, pain is good, means I'm still alive" you think, you heard something, it sounded like crying. You ever so slowly open your eyes, you realized you were in Mihal's bedroom more specifically in the center of her bed reclining against the pillows. You were just able to look down and see that your whole torso was bandaged up, thankfully the bandages weren't bloody so that meant you'd probably survive the wound. You looked around weakly for where the crying is coming from and you spot Mihal sitting in a chair weeping.

"Mihal" you say weakly, her ears perk up and she looks around and then at you. She moves closer and lowers her ear to just above you "Mihal" you say again and she smiles the largest you've ever seen.

"Your alive, he's alive" she shouts before looking like she's going to cry again "Jake I am so, so sorry, it was all a plot to kill you, and I helped" Mihal says.

You stared up at her and weakly smiled "it's, alright.....I would feel horrible and be angry if I thought you had betrayed me" you say weakly. Mihal looks down at you and ever so gently lifts you up before laying down herself on the bed and gently setting you down in her chest. Mihal stared down at you and gently started to pet your head "don't worry, I'll make sure these conspirators are brought to justice, and executed for what they have done" Mihal says almost growling again. You stared up at her stunned, you wanted some sort of recompense but you didn't want whoever did this dead, that would make you no better then them.

"MIhal" you croak out and she lowers her head "yes?" she replies. You ever so slowly sit up wincing as you lose your balance for a second, "Mihal, I want you to find out who did this, but don't execute them" you say.

"What?' she says staring at you shocked "but they hurt you, they manipulated me they must be brought to justice" she says and you wince again but this time it wasn't out of pain, it was fear.

"Mihal" you say again and she lowers her head, you hug the front of her muzzle and start gently stroking it "please, I don't need vengance, All I've seen of in the past week are sadness and anger" you say. She stares down at you wondering what you are thinking before you speak again as you let go of her muzzle "Mihal, I'm....I'm afraid of you right now, your not acting like the kind wonderful vixen I fell in love with" you say. Mihal stares down at you stunned and gently picks you up and moves you onto the bed before lowering her head near you so you were mostly eye to eye.

"I am sorry Jake, you're right I haven't been a very good wife, it would have been better if the accusation were true I deserve to be cheated on" she says starting to tear up.

"Shh, shh, no you don't" you say stroking her muzzle.

Mihal lifts her head and stares at you "Jake how can you forgive me, I almost got you killed, I've been nothing but angry and bad-tempered, and I wouldn't listen to your side of the story" she says.

You stared up at Mihal "are you still the vixen I fell in love with and had 2 wonderful children with?" you ask. Mihal slowly nods and you lay back "I can't stay mad because I love you Mihal and as long as you at your core remain the kind vixen I first met, I always will" you say. You felt your body grow heavy and just before you fell asleep you heard Mihal whisper "I'll always trust you from now on, no matter what."
112112221.title: Skip to the trial

1121122212.content: So you wake up in the hospital. But are you fully recovered or are there still some pains?
1121122212.title: You wake up in a medical bed

choices: Refuse and go through with the trial
112112222.content:
You spent the next few days hanging in your prison, pondering your fate. Mihal wouldn't so much as look at you, let alone speak to you. Sometimes you would peek over the side of the cage, and Mihal would be asleep, while Kevin and Yasmin were reaching up at you. You would reach back at them.


It broke your heart that this was happening to them. You just hoped that when they get older, they don't remember this. Of course, just because you were in solitary confinement, and Mihal was pissed at you, doesn't mean she was cruel. You were brought fruit and water twice a day. Mihal would open the cage door, shove it in, lock the door, and leave without saying a word.


You barely slept at all. At night, you could hear Mihal crying in her sleep. Clearly, this was hurting her even more than it did you. You dreaded what would happen if you're found guilty. Mihal said the punishment was death, but how would it be carried out? Would you be crushed? Eaten? Or maybe have your limbs tied to rocks and thrown into the sea? You shuddered at either thought.


The day before the trial, the door to your cage opened, and Mihal placed a lioness anthro in front of you, shutting the door behind her, and leaving.


The lioness was dressed in a white toga with gold trim, and wore what could be described as glasses, two crystal lenses in a bamboo frame, that sat on the bridge of her nose.


"Greetings Jacob." She says. "My name is Sarabi. I am to be your arbiter during your trial." "Arbiter?" You ask. "Yes. I will be defending you, and hopefully, if worst comes to worst, at least get you a lighter sentence."


She sat down cross legged in front of you. "So, can you tell me where you were the night before the accusations were brought to light?" You concentrate on what you had done a week ago. "Well, I remember going on my usual stroll."


That part was at least true. Lately you had gotten into the hobby of going for an evening stroll around the city. "After that, everything is a blur. I don't even remember how I ended up back with Mihal." Sarabi nods. "I see." She leans in closer and lowers her voice. "Your majesty, I'm going to be blunt. There is a conspiracy against you."


"I knew it!" You say. "Someone framed me! But who? And Why? Wait, how do you know this?"


"I overheard a group of people talking about how their plan was working, and that you were sure be executed. The entire island knows about your trial, and they're planning to kave you killed in front of everyone. Even worse, Mihal will be the one to do it. Here, the empress is judge, jury, and executioner."


You are suddenly overcome with rage. "When I get out of this, I'll have whoever is behind it all ground into dust!" You say, clenching your fists and teeth. "That's the problem." Says Sarabi. "I'm not sure you can get out of this. The evidence against you is very strong. You'll likely be put to death. But, I might be able to help you in another way."


"How?" You ask.


"Tonight, me and some of my friends who also want to save you, will sneak you out of the palace, and to the island shore. There is a rowboat there, that washed up during a storm. We'll provide you with food and water, and you can escape this island. It is really your only chance for survival."
112112222.title: Follow the week leading up to the trial

choices: Don't take her offer and tell her you need to prove yourself innocent.
Take her offer,you have to get out of there before something else goes wrong.
1121122221.content:
"I'll gladly take the offer,but I can't leave the island,what will I tell my children? How will Mihal act to this?" You answer her,thinking this is the chance you've been waiting for. "Perhaps we should break you out of here,so you can prove your innocence in someway,somehow force Jengra to say your innocent?" Sarabi says,a little confused at your answer. "Perhaps we should just break out now...before Mihal wakes up,then we talk about what we'll do afterwards,later." You replied,looking out at the titanic sleeping vixen.

"Then shall we go?" Says Sarabi,pulling out a knife that can easily pick through the pathetic lock. "Well there's no time to waste,hurry and unlock it,we need to get out of here before-" you were interupted by a long yawn from Mihal,both you and Sarabi freezing,you dared to glance at her,and found her still asleep.

"Hurry!" You whispered to Sarabi as she fumbled with the knife and the lock,snapping it in half. "Oh forget the lock!" You almost yell as you kick open the door,both of you noticing the long drop before you two. "Now what...?" You say to Sarabi,worry creeping in your voice. "Now,THIS!" Says Sarabi,as she pulls out a rope,you think it's better not to ask her where she got the rope from,due to the movement of Mihal in her sleep,knowing she was going to wake up soon.

Sarabi quickly tied a rope to a strong bar near the door of the cage,and both of you slid down it hastily,landing on the room floor,making a little noice on contact.
Mihal stirred a little,wondering where did the sound come from,rising into a sitting position on her bed. "What was that?" She said to herself,looking around her room,her eyes locking onto the door of the cage.

"BOOK IT!" You yelled at Sarabi,both of you running as a loud crash echoed throughout the room,signalling the queen has noticed her missing prisoner,along with his arbiter.

As you both ran out of her room,crashing came from behind both of you,Mihal fuming of both of you trying to escape,you and Sarabi hid in the shadows,watching Mihal running past,although her attempts would be futile,for she had already lost both of you.

"Thanks Sarabi,but you've helped me enough...and Mihal will probably sentence you to death if she knew you helped me..." You say to Sarabi,panting. "I'll announce that you've escaped to the one's who wanted to help you,but I'll be sure to keep this quiet,we can always give you a raft,food,and other supplies if you still want to escape?"

You then...
1121122221.title: Take the offer or prove yourself innocent.

1121122222.content:
"No. I can't do that." You say. "That would probably be worse on Kevin and Yasmin, growing up thinking their father abandoned them. If I die, they'll at least know that I loved them. " Sarabi sighed. "Very well. We may as well come up with an alibi for you then. I'll try to get you a less severe punishment, but I can't make any promises."


The Day of the Trial..........


The day had finally come. Your fate would finally be decided. That morning, Mihal took you out of your cage and placed you on the floor, handing you over to two guards. "Take him to the box while I get ready." She commanded. The guards bowed and did as told. They grabbed your arms and dragged you out the door, through the hall, your feet scraping the floor.


They dragged you into the throne room. There, what seemed like the entire island sat on the floor in front of the throne. Before the throne sat another cage, but this one was much smaller and narrower. you were placed inside the cage and locked inside. Mihal entered the room. Instead of her usual white attire, she was dressed in a black version of her usual dress. She sat on her throne, and stared down at you with a sneer.


"Jake." She said. "You are accused of adultery and treason. The penalty for which, is death. How do you plead?"


"Not guilty." You say. "Will the arbiter please step forward?" Sarabi steps out of the crowd and approaches Mihal. "The defendant claims to have been on an evening stroll the night the supposed crime took place. He also claims to have only ever mated with Jengra on your orders. Past that, he's never even seen her."


"Jengra, step forward." Says Mihal. Jengra approaches and stands next to Sarabi. "You claim Jake has been visiting you every night for the past few weeks?" Mihal asks. "That is true my queen." Says Jengra. "What would happen during these visits?"


"He would come into my house, I'd make him a nice dinner, we'd have a bit of wine, then we would sometimes, shall I say, "Play around". Then he'd leave."


"Did he promise you my throne, and that he would poison me to give it to you?" Asks Mihal. "Yes. He said so in the letter." Jengra produced a scroll from inside her sleeve, and showed it to Mihal. "Arbiter, read the letter."


Sarai takes the letter and reads it out loud.

"My dearest Jengra,


Mihal remains unaware of our little excursion. Soon, we can be together without fear of discovery. Once I have disposed of Mihal, we shall rule this Island together, no one will be able to separate us. As for the two little brats, they shall be dealt with as well. I shall poison them all when the time is right. No one will suspect a thing, and Anthromia will be ours!


Dearly yours,

Jake"


"No one else saw this?" Asks Mihal. "Yes, actually. Some of the citizens here witnessed him sneaking in through my window." "Who? Raise your hands." Commands Mihal. Five anthros in the crowd raise their hands. "After you "Played around", that is how your scent was on him?" Asks Mihal.


"It is, my queen." Says Jengra. "Very well. Does the defense have anything to say?" You bow your head, knowing you have been beaten. "No, Mihal. I have nothing."


A tear runs down Mihal's face as she speaks. "Then, Jake, you are hear by found guilty of both charges. I have no choice but to sentence you to death by digestion. To be carried out immediately."


Mihal reaches down to pick up your cage, when Sarabi cries "WAIT!" Mihal pauses as Sarabi motions for her to bend down closer. Sarabi whispers in Mihal's ear, and she sits back in her throne.


"Very well. The Arbiter has made a very good point. Since your are the king, and my husband, I shall......."
1121122222.title: Refuse and go through with the trial

11211222221.content:
"What do you mean?" You ask, having no idea what she meant by "transmogrification". "You'll see." Says Mihal. She snaps her fingers, and two guards open your cage and drag you out by your arms. They bring you in front of Mihal and stand on either side of you, forcing you onto your knees, holding you up by your arms.


"Bring the potion." Orders Mihal. A guard leaves the throne room, and comes back with a vile containing a strange, glowing blue liquid. "Administer the punishment." Mihal commands. The guard stands in front of you, and tilts your head back.


She forces you to open your mouth with her fingers an pours the strange fluid down your throat. The taste is so awful, it makes you gag! Like someone liquified old gym socks. You sit there, coughing for a few seconds. Then, the pain hits.


Burning, searing pain, as though your insides were on fire. The guards release your arms as you collapse on all fours. Your skin burns, as yellow fur with black spots sprouts from every follicle on your body. Your insides feel as though they are being torn out and rearranged.


Your jaws feel like nails are being driven into your gums, as your teeth reshape into fangs. You face elongates into a muzzle, your nose and eyes change into that of a feline. Your ears become rounded and small, and move to the top of your head.


Your feel as though every bone in your body is snapping in two, as your entire form elongates and enlarges, tearing your clothes to shreds. Your fingers and toes feel like they are being split and claws shoot out from the tips. Finally, you feel a tail tear its way out of your backside.


How bad was the pain? Well, if you're a guy, and you've ever taken a hit to the groin, imagine that pain, multiplied by a thousand percent. Yes, ouch indeed.


Finally, the pain stops. You sit there, hunched over, naked, and panting. "What........was...........that?" You ask between gasps. One of the guards hold a large mirror in front of you. There, staring back at you, is an anthro cheetah. You place your clawed hand on the surface of the glass, the cheetah does likewise.


"I'm.........one of you." You say. "Yes." Says Mihal. "You had better learn to love the pain, because there's a lot more of it to come." "What do you mean?" You ask. "That potion you drank will cause you to continually transform into an anthronian at random. you may change again in a few minutes, or a few days. Either way, there is no way to control it."


"So I'm stuck enduring unbearable pain for the rest of my life!?" You exclaim. "Maybe, maybe not." Says Mihal. "If I feel you have learned your lesson, I might give you the antidote. Until then, well, you know what they say. Love hurts."


Mihal stands up from her throne and waves a hand. "Court is dismissed." The crowd begins funneling out through the doors. You run up to Mihal's feet and look up at her. "Please tell me I can at least be with you and the kids again." You beg. Mihal ponders it for a moment.


"Very well." She says. "You may be with us again. But, to add to your punishment, you're going to be doing a lot more around here than what you did before. Such as helping me take care of the children, giving me belly rubs, and anything else I can think of. Understand?"


You sigh. "Yes, my dear."
11211222221.title: Transformation.....Worse than Death?

112112222211.content: Leaving an option open if someone has a different idea.
112112222211.title: That night

1121122222111.content:
A black cloak and hood covered Jengra growled as she made her way to the meeting place far away from the city. The queen was suppose to devour that wretched human, not subject him to the blasted transformation potion. Things were not going according to the plan. She reached the cave before removing her hood and entering it. Inside she followed the torches before reaching the innermost part of the cave. Various anthros sat around a stone table, each one wearing the same black cloak Jengra wore.

"Ah, Jengra you have returned to us. With good news I hope." Said Narlina, a female lioness.

"Unfortunately sisters, I do not. While the human was found guilty, the 'queen'" she said the word with disgust "subjected him to the transformation potion instead of devouring him like we thought she would."

"This is a set back for us then." Said Sutah, a female horse. "We were suppose to dispose of the half-breeds after she devoured him and make it look like an accident."

"This could still work in our favor." Said Sari, a white tigress. "The transformations are random and he can't control what his body does during it as the body does tend to lash out in pain. Whose to say we can't make it look like he killed his own half-breeds while in the mist of changing. But make it look like the evidence says he did it on purpose to get back at Mihal for being wrongfully punished."

"Sari, that is brilliant. You were always the smart one." Said a deep female voice, the only one that had yet to remove their hood. "And with that, she'll be proven unfit to rule. And the guards loyal to us will make sure there won't be any other successor, leaving the throne vacant. Ripe for me to reclaim what is rightfully mine." The woman removes her hood, revealing a black dragon. "And once I regain the throne, you, descendants of my faithful followers will be handsomely rewarded for your loyalty."

"We are pleased to serve Empress Kiha." Jengra said while bowing her head.
1121122222111.title: Reserved

112112222212.content:
The next seven days give the phrase “Hell Week” a whole new meaning. As Mihal had promised, you went from one extremely painful transformation to another at random. You had lost count of exactly how many times you’ve changed. So far you have been a leopard, a cat, a bat, a snake, a mongoose, a dragon, a husky, a crow, a mouse, a squirrel, a skunk, and you lost track of what else.


You wondered just how much more of this you could withstand before you finally went mad from the pain. On top of all this, Mihal forced you to do various tasks around the palace. These ranged from scrubbing her entire throne from top to bottom, to giving Kevin and Yasmin a bath using only your tongue.


Speaking of Kevin and Yasmin, when they first saw you in your transfigured state, they didn’t recognize you and growled at you. Mihal had to tell them it was you before you could get near them. Mihal would also make you do such tasks as cleaning the inside of her mouth, or between her toes. She would also make you massage her back, which, given it was as long as a football field, left your body hurting even more.


Mihal may have been kind and loving, but she could hold one hell of a grudge.


One night you sat on Mihal’s belly, scratching it as she lay in bed, Kevin and Yasmin asleep at her sides. Currently you were in the form of a wolf. “Mihal?” You ask. She grunted in response. “ I need to talk to you.” Mihal picked you up between her fingers and placed you on her right breast. “What is it?”


“It’s just……” You begin. “Well, I have done everything you have told me to do this past week without complaint, not to mention I’ve transfigured I don’t know how many times. Each of which, was more painful than if I had been a victim of the Spanish Inquisition.”


“The what?” Mihal asks, confused.


“Never mind.” You say. “Anyway, don’t you think I’ve suffered enough?” Mihal didn’t respond for a moment, before saying, “ I don’t know. I think You should go another month, just to be sure the message is drilled into your head, to never betray me again.”


“Mihal, please, listen to me!” You say. “Do you really think I would betray YOU? The woman who took me in when I was stranded with no way home? Who I fell in love with and who birthed my children? Only someone truly heartless would betray a love like that! You know I am not heartless.”


Just then, you feel the transformation flaring up again. You writhe and roll on Mihal’s breast as your entire body feels as though you were being dunked in molten slag. You change from a wolf to a fox. Your fur turns orange, with your belly, chest, and chin being white, and black on your hands and feet. You tail becomes thick and bushy, white a tip of white at the end.


As you finish transforming, you lay there panting. “I wish I could believe you.” Says Mihal, with a hint of sadness. “But the evidence that you are guilty is too compelling.”


“Mihal!” You half yell, now starting to get angry. “I never wrote that letter! There is a conspiracy against me, Sarabi told me so!” At this, Mihal’s ears perk up. “Why didn’t she say anything about this then?”

“It doesn’t matter.” You say. “Please, just end this now, it’s been torture for both of us, in more ways than one.” “What do you mean?” Miahl asks. “I mean, just knowing that you harbor this anger towards me is worse than any punishment you could give me.” You say, hanging your head. A single tear rolls down Mihal’s cheek.


She holds you up to her face and nuzzles you as she cries. “To say that, you must be truly innocent.” You hug her cheek and pat her. “It’s okay. Don’t cry.” You say. “You must hate me now for what I’ve done to you.” Says Mihal, now beginning to whine like a puppy.


“Never.” You say. “You did what had to be done, even if it was for a false charge.” You climb up Mihal’s face to the top of her head and scratch her ears until she stops crying. “Thank you.” she says, her voice quivering slightly. “I am going to end this right now.”


She carefully get out of bed and makes her way to the bedroom door, with you still on top of her head. She opens the door and orders the servant standing outside it to bring her the antidote. The servant ran off anf came back a few minutes later carrying a vile with a glowing red liquid inside.


Mihal placed you in her palm and handed you the vile between her fingers. You uncork the vile with your teeth and hastily swallow the liquid down, eager to end this constant torture.


Option 1: The antidote works! You are fully transformed back into a human. Of course, the conspirators will still be looking for a way to dispose of you, and will likely send an assassin this time.

Option 2: The antidote only half works. It stops your random transformations, but you are permanently stuck as a fox. At least maybe now the conspirators will stop trying to kill you.
112112222212.title: A week later

11211222222.content:
"My request is to have one last cup of wine with Jengra." You say. Mihal scowls. "Very well. Arbiter, fetch some wine." Sarabi leaves the throne room and comes back with a bottle and two cups. The guards unlock your cage and you step out, walking over to Jengra.


Sarabi hands you both a cup, and pours. You hold your cup in front of you. "To you, my dear." You say. Jengra toasts h her cup against yours. "To you, my king." She puts her cup to her lips and drinks. You do likewise, but only pretend to drink.


"So, Jengra. Exactly how did your scent get on me?" You ask. "Oh, it was easy." Says Jengra matter-of-factly."You were on your evening walk and you stopped at a wine-house for a drink. I followed you there and greeted you, and pretended to share a few drinks with you. Once you were drunk enough, it was easy to seduce you into coming back to my place and have some fun with you. After that, I left you outside the palace steps, Mihal found you there, brought you inside, and step one was complete."


"Step one of what?" you ask. "Our plan to frame you and have you executed." Says Jengra as though it were common knowledge. Several gasps arose from the crowd, loudest of all from Mihal.


"I didn't really write that letter, did I?" You say. "Nope. Forged it this morning." Says Jengra. "Also, those supposed witnesses who saw me with you, they're in on this too, aren't they?" You ask. "Yep, they planned it all, and I carried it out." Jengra suddenly slaps her hand over her mouth, realizing everything she just said.


You smile. The truth potion in the wine had done the trick. Just like you and Sarabi planned. At this point, the five anthros who had raised their hands earlier shoot up and run for the exit. "Seize them!" Shouts Mihal. All the guards run after the conspirators, while Jengra stands there, still in shock of what she had just done.


A few minutes later, The guards came back, dragging the five traitors, all of whom were felines. She stood before Mihal on their knees, heads bowed. "So, you tricked me into nearly killing my own mate!" Says Mihal furiously. " For that you will all suffer far worse than what Jake would have endured, I promise you that!"


Mihal ordered the guards to take the conspirators, including Jengra, to the dungeons, where she would deal with the later. After they had left, she picked you up and nuzzled you to her cheek, tears streaming from her eyes. "My king, I am so sorry! Please, can you ever forgive me?"


"Of course." you say, hugging her cheek. "It's not your fault. They did this to me, not you."


"Speaking of which." Says Mihal, holding you in front of her. "What would you have me do with the conspirators?"
11211222222.title: "Grant you one last request."

choices: You follow Mihal to her quarters
112112222222.content:
"I say you should spare them." you say.
"Are you sure Jake?" Mihal asks.
"Yes, though you could put Jengra and the others in the containment chamber for interrogation and then have them spend a month in the dungeon." you say.
"Alright." she says.
She turns to Jengra and the conspirors.
"You're lucky my mate is sparing you guys." she snarls.
"GUARDS! TAKE THE PRISONERS TO THE HOLDING CHAMBERS FOR INTERROGATION!" Mihal orders.
"Yes, your highness." the guards say as they drag the prisoners away.
"Jake, I need to talk to you in the royal quarters, when you feel ready please come see me." Mihal says as she heads to her room.
112112222222.title: Spare them

12.content:
Before you sits an imposing sight. A giant female gray wolf, with long black hair tied in a ponytail, dressed in a flowing black robes that covers her feet. Around her neck is a blood red ruby in a black frame attached to a chain. She beckons you with a finger.

You slowly walk toward her, terrified of what will happen. "What is your name?" She demands. "Jake." You say timidly. "Well, Jake, do you know where you are?" She says smiling evily. "No." You say.

"You are on the island of Anthromia, and we don't take kidly to inturders here." "But I'm not a" "Silence!" She snaps. "Here, my word is law. It is my decisions to decide you fate. Now hold still." The ruby around her neck begins to glow, suddenly you are lifed into the air, as if by an invisible hand!

Your lims flail all over as you float towards her face. When you are close enough, she licks you with her long wet tongue. You gag at the stench of her breath, and shiver as you are covered in drool.

After licking her lips, she puases, thinking about what to do with you. "Alright, I've decided." She says after a minute of thought.
12.title: Kibal, the evil sorceror wolfess

choices: Bring me water! I'll drown the intruder!"
Bring me food! I'll crush the intruder underneath it!"
Bring me my potions! I want to try something out."
121.content:
"Wait! Hold on, I-" You try to protest, but it's too late.

"And down you go!" And she dropped you into her enormous mouth. You try to grab onto something, but her throat is just too slippery. Not much later you end up in her stomach. You prepare yourself for the painful digestion...

But nothing happens? Well, you get covered in her stomach fluids, but that doesn't really count.

"Why am I not being digested?" You wonder aloud. You are apparently undigestable. Lucky (or not so lucky, depends on how you view it) you. And there's actually a bit of light in here, coming from outside through her skin.

The stomach is pretty big, twice the size of a big living room, giving you a lot of space. You then hear the voice of Kibal talking to you:

"Why aren't you screaming in agony? You should be near death by now!" And she doesn't sound happy.

"I don't understand it either!" You yell back. "I'm perfectly fine!"

"What?! Impossible!" She yells. "Guards,
121.title: "You shall be my food."

choices: Yes! You made it to safety just in time, and are able to remain in her stomach.
No! The water drags you deeper into her digestive system!
1211.content:
Kibal snarls for her guards to fetch her a drink, and they return with a large barrel of water. She fills a glass with it and raises it to her lips. "Let us see how long you can survive this, intruder!" she growls, raising the glass to her lips and chugging down the contents. In her stomach, you are washed off of your feet and swirled around in the liquid - but it's surprisingly easy to stay afloat. Another cascade of water follows as Kibal drinks a second glass, then a third, fourth and fifth! You decide playing dead might be a good idea at this point and just start floating around on your back, keeping as silent as you can. More water flows in, lifting you up until you almost touch the roof of her stomach... But not quite. There's a good few seconds of silence, and then a satisfied grunt from the wolf, who lays back in her throne with a loud belch.

Meanwhile, you simply lay there floating. These aren't the best conditions - but at least you're not in immediate danger, you guess. And so you lay there, waiting for something to happen. The water level in the stomach slowly drops over time as she absorbs it into her system, leaving the room about a quarter full before something happens... A little sphincter, so small you hadn't spotted it yet, opens up near the base and begins to suck the water downwards, quickly forming a huge waterfall! You swim and swim away from it - but are you safe?
1211.title: Bring me water! I'll drown the intruder!"

choices: Try to make your way back into her stomach
12112.content:
Surprised by the sudden current, you immediately attempt to try and swim away from the direction of the flow. Never at all did you think a stomach would be this strong enough to create such a whirlpool like effect, but then again, this was the first stomach you were ever in. With arms rapidly paddling towards one of the walls, you hope with all your might that you'd be able to latch onto the squishy surface to prevent from being washed down. However, luck just didn't seem to be on your side as your plight only halts your inevitable path. The wall, despite being yards away now, simply wiggled about as if teasing at your useless attempts of escape.

Just as you were about to shout, your whole body ends up being submerged straight down into the mixed liquids of water and stomach acid. Momentarily dazed, bubbles form around you as your head spins from the shear force of the suction. Your lower body soon manages to get sent straight into a rather tight hole, as a squishy like sensation wraps around your waist. A quick shudder courses down your spine by the odd feeling the lower sphincter provided as it greedily begins to slurp up your form. In no time, your whole body was slurped up before being deposited right through the compact hole.

The current soon begins to lighten up in intensity as you somehow manage to arise up from the watery surface with a gasp. "y-you've got to be kidding." you stutter in utter revolt, now aware of your new location. Now at the start of the wolfess leader's intestines you groan as you look at the pink surface of the huge tube wriggle in excitement from your arrival. Now stuck deeper within the giant wolf woman's gut, you have to plan some course of action.
12112.title: Deeper into the depths of the evil wolfess

122.content:
"WHAT!?" You exclaim. "Would you prefer the alternative?" She asks, opening her mouth wide, revealing rows of white, sharp teeth. "No! Okay! I'll be your slave!" You quickly say. She lowers you to the floor with her magic. "Get him in something more......appropriate."

Her guards drag you away. They strip you of your wet clothes and dress you in a loin cloth, they put a single shackle on your wrist, and lock it in place. "As long as you wear that, you shall forever be a slave." One of them says.

You can't believe your bad luck. First your thrown overboard, then your captured by animals, now, you a slave. How could this get any worse, you wonder? Well, your about to get your answer.

The guards bring you back to the giant wolfess. One of the pokes you in the back with her spear. "Kneel!" She says. You obediently do so, fearing the consequences of not doing what you are told to do. You get down on one knee, and bow your head, staring at the floor. "My name is Kibal." Says the giantess. "You are to address me as Mistress. Understand?" "Yes, Mistress." You say at once.

"You are to follow my every command, and do whatever my bidding may be. If you disobey me, you will be my dinner." "Yes, Mistress." "Also, don't bother trying to escape. Your bracer is enchanted. If you run away, I will know exactly where you are. When you are captured again, you will be punished as I see fit."

You nod, fearing what would happen if you said no. "Now, come here." You stand and approach her.
122.title: "You shall be my slave."

1221.content:
She points to a guard. "Show him where the kitchen is." The guard takes your hand and leads you down a long hallway. When you get to the kitchen, you are shocked by what you see.

Other slaves are bustling around the stone kitchen, some humans, mostly anthros, busily preparing food, as though it was the last thing they would ever do. Which, you had a feeling it would be if they didn't get done on time.

The guard takes you to an enormous pot on a fire in the center of the room, surrounded by ladders. Slaves stand on top of the ladders around the pot, peeling and cutting vegetables and throwing them in. The guard hands you an onion and a small knife, then turns around and leaves.

You climb a free ladder and begin cutting, the fumes of the onion burning your eyes. "You new here?" A voice next to you asks. You turn to see another human slave. He has dark black hair, and looks a little too skinny for his height. "Yeah." you say. "Well, I hope you have a good work ethic." He says. "Because if you don't, your the one who will be thrown in the pot next. The name's Kyle." "Jake." You say.

You both stand there cutting, talking to each other. "So how did you get here?" You ask. "I was out fishing in my boat on the ocean. I saw this island and came ashore to explore it. I've been here for three years now."

"Wait, so you have a boat on the shore?" you ask. "I did. I don't know if it's still there." He replies solemnly. "Don't even think about trying to find it. We'd never make it."

Your stomach begins growling. "When do they feed us?" You ask. "When Kibal finishes her dinner. Then we eat whatever's left. But there's never much left." He says. That would explain his wiry frame. After you finish cutting the onions, you begins doing potatoes and carrots. But you are shocked when the time comes to add the meat.

Slaves, whom you assume had tried to escape, are thrown into the pot by guards.Their screams echo through the entire kitchen. You know that you'd best follow their example, if you don't want to end up like them.

Finally, Kibal enters the kitchen, towering over everyone. "I'm hungry. You all better hope you did a good job with my stew." The goes over to a huge cabinet and pulls out a wooden bowl and spoon. Then she gets out a ladle big enough to be the big dipper. She scoops the slave soup into her bowl and tastes it.

"Good enough." She says. "She drinks at least ten bowls of the soup before she is satisfied. After she leaves, the slaves begin crowding around the pot, hoping to get some of the stew themselves. They take long hollow bamboo chutes and use them as straws, sucking the leftover soup up. You don't even bother to. The idea of eating soup with human in it disgusts you.

After cleaning up the kitchen, you are taken to the slave quarters, a huge dark room with a single fire in the center. They only thing to sleep on is piles of straw. You lay in a corner trying to sleep, while the other gather around the fire, talking.

"I hear that her power comes from that jewel around her neck." One says. "Even if it did, how would we get it?" Says another. You ignore them and their illusions of a way to escape. You know your stuck here for the rest of your life.

That night, you dream you are running away from Kibal through the jungle, her footsteps making the very ground shake. Suddenly her huge hand grabs you and holds you over her head. She licks her lips as she opens her mouth, blasting you with her gagging breath. You scream as you are dropped into the darkness of her throat.

You awake with a start. Someone was shaking you while you slept! You feel a hand close over your mouth in the darkness. "Come with me." A voice whispers in your ear. "I know how to escape this place. I can lead you to freedom."
1221.title: "Bring me my dinner."

12211.content:
Your realize the hand over your mouth has fur on it. It must be an anthro slave. You decide this is the only chance you have of escaping this place. The mysterious figure takes your hand and leads your through the darkness to the exit of the slave quarters. When you reach the outside, you can see in the moonlight that your rescuer is a wolf.

He pushes you down into a crouch as you both creep around the corner of the building into the jungle. The wolf turns to you and whispers "My name is Kale. I overheard you and the one called Kyle in the kitchen. I know where his boat is. I can lead you to it."

"Jake.." She starts out slowly. "Let me tell you a little story, I'll keep it short and sweet as to not bore you." she finishes in a sarcastic tone giving way to a small grin revealing those ever dangerous teeth of hers.

"One thing you probably notice about this island, other then the anthropomorphic creatures, is that there are no males."


As she talks, you realize that she was right, everyone you had seen so far had been female, you listen as she continues.

"A long time ago, there were males, just smaller males, maybe a little big then you."

You put in "Well what happened to them?"

"Quiet you" the Wolfess glared

"There was a revolution of sorts, the larger, more powerful female Amazon Anthros of the island captured the males, with the help of this" She taps a claw to the ruby necklace she was wearing.

"Once we had proven to be the dominant sex, we enslaved them."

You gasp quietly at the thought of all this.

"There are some, males left" she continues "but they have disappeared into the depths of the jungle" she smirks at her next thought "even some females joined them... what fools".

The way the Wolfess spoke just a moment ago made it sound as if she was hiding something. You quickly think that the remaining males and you guessed some females must be hidden out in the jungle, this might be your only chance of escape, or even survival.

She started to speak again, "And now on to you my little furless friend. Few of your kind appear on our island, only 3 others before you have washed up on my shores. You see, it is very rare we have slaves around, we would never enslave our own gender, but seeing you are male, makes you the perfect candidate. One sadly remarkable thing about you humans is how little pain you can withstand. At least with our males, they put up a fight, a struggle, they make it fun, but for you, it's just work work work. However, this is a good thing, because your kind make some of the most obedient slaves I have ever seen, with such little effort for us. I don't even have to hurt you to make you do something, but that will always be an option, just up to you.
So, slave, let's get back to your punishment, that story tired me out. How about a nice foot bath." She smirked

What she said didn't register in your brain, and you let out in involuntary "What?"

"You heard me" she said coldly " you are to clean my paws"

She adjusted herself again so her massive gray furred, footpaws were placed in front of you. What lay before you was an expanse of paw pad and fur.

"Well how am I suppose to do that?"


"Don't talk back to your new master, slave. Just for that, you can have the pleasure of using your tongue" She said in a smug tone.
"Do it now, or I'll end you like the little bug you are."

You decided not to risk it, you will need your chance to escape, and being squashed under her foot isn't part of the plan. You preceded with a grimace on your face. You stepped towards her paws again, bringing your face close to the rough leathery surface of her dark gray pawpad. A musky odor was detected, you hadn't noticed it so much while massaging earlier, but the closer you get to her furry toes, the stronger the smell gets. You get back to licking, repeating the process all over again on the rest of the ball of her footpaw and then the heel. She spoke in a groggy but commanding voice. "Your not done yet"

Finally, she begins to tire of this game. "Alright, now take him to my chambers. I'll play with him some more there." The two guards who found you grab your arms and drag you through the palace halls, to a huge black stone door.

They push the door open like it was nothing, and push you inside. Inside, the room is lit by torches. In the corner is a massive mirror. Apparently, Kibal likes to admire herself. In the other corner is a pile of bones. You dread to think what they came from.

In the center of the room is a gigantic bed, with black sheets and black curtains around it. The guards nudge you toward the bed with their spear tips. When you reach the bed, you stare up at the top. To you, it looks like you're at the bottom of a mountain.

The skunk guard pokes you with her spear. "Get climbing." She says. You gulp and grab hold of the sheets, and start to climb. You don't know how long it took you to get to the top, but when you do, you're exhausted.
