"Thirsty, slave?" Asks Kibal, lifting you up to her face again. You nod. "Well too bad! The only spring on this island is reserved for me. Everyone else drinks from the river."

She pulls her clothes back on and carries you to the dining hall in her fist. Her food is already at the table in a gigantic bowl. She carries to bowl in her other hand over to a lounge chair. Next to the chair is a large scaffold and platform. She places you and the bowl on the platform and lays back in the lounge chair, with her head looking up at you.

She conjures a ladder with her magic and places it against the bowl for you to climb up. "Now, feed me my breakfast." She says, opening her mouth wide, waiting for you to throw her food into it.

You climb the ladder and are horrified at what you find. The bowl is full of slaves! Anthro and human alike, they had tried to escape, and now were to suffer their fate. You pick up one of the slaves, a young cat boy, by the shoulders.

He looks at you pleadingly. "Please! Don't do this!" Should you obey your mistress and feed her? Or make a break for it, and help everyone escape?
122221212.title: You submit to her orders and begin licking the ...

1222212121.content:
You are faced with an ethical dilemma as you clearly hold life and death in your hands. You take a moment to examine the facts: the slaves are your species, and they probably have families of their own worried sick because their family member hasn't come back yet. Not to mention if you sent the cat boy to be shredded up in Kibal's teeth, that would mean you were indirectly responsible for cannibalism... inter-species cannibalism, but still, it would put a black mark on your record. In short, you weren't keen on doing it.


On the other hand... An infinitely more important hand, you don't want to be shredded up in Kibal's teeth either...

Kibal interrupted your thoughts saying "It's time for my breakfast. Either feed me the other slaves, or you're going to supplement them!"

You choose to sacrifice the other slaves. Not a highly respected choice, but...

"Sorry kid." Bidding the cat farewell, you throw him up into the jaws of your mistress.

How will she eat him?
1222212121.title: Just feed her

choices: "I heard your little conversation with Mira last night."
12222122.content:
You awake to total darkness. The only sound you here is Kibal's light snores. But you could swear you heard a voice whispering. Then, you really do hear a voice.

"Psst! Over here! At the cage door!" You are cautious of the strange voice beckoning you. "Who's there?" You whisper back. "A friend. I'm here to help you."

You feel your way to the cage door, and can just barely make out the outline of another amazon. A ten foot tall panther. "What do you want?" You ask. "To help you." She responds.

"Why would you help me?" You ask suspiciously. "I'm part of a resistance against Kibal. She turned her own sister, our previous queen, to stone and took the throne for herself. She made all the males, including her own son, into slaves and eats them if they try to escape. Her reign of tyranny has gone on for far too long."

"Who are you?" You ask. "My name is Mira. I am Kibal's chamber maid. You are her personal slave right?"

"I am now." You say, groaning over your still sore body. "Good. You'll be much closer to her than any of us. That means sooner or later you'll have a chance to help us overthrow her."

"What do you want me to do?" You ask. "Does she like the way you taste?" Asks Mira. "Yes. I can still smell her breath." You reply. "Excellent."

She hands you a corked bottle. "What is this?" You ask. "Poison. Rub it all over yourself before she put you in her mouth again, and she's as good as dead."

"You want me to rub poison all over myself!?" You whisper back furiously. "Don't worry, as long as you don't ingest it, it won't harm you. Once she's gone, we will select a new empress, and you can be sent home if you wish."

"Alright. I'll do it." You say. "Thank you. Be sure to rub that stuff on you before she wakes up, odds are she'll want to taste you again first thing in the morning." She turns and walks to the edge of the giant table. She leaps down and gracefully lands on her feet, vanishing from sight.

The next morning, the torches around the room magically light again. You take that as the signal to get to work. You uncork the bottle and poor the poison on your hand, rubbing it over your body.

When that is done, you hide the bottle in your straw pile bed. Just as you finish, Kibal stretches and yawns. "Good morning, slave." She says, staring at you maliciously.

Something about that look she gives you unsettles you. She smirks and says......
12222122.title: Another anthro wakes you in the middle of the n...

choices: You can't keep it up; you sell out Mira
You tough it out; Kibal must be overthrown
122221221.content:
"I heard your little conversation with Mira last night."

Your blood turned cold as Kibal smoothly slid off her bed. She lightly gripped her necklace, the ruby glowing for a moment as the black silken sheets remade themselves perfectly; even the pillows were fluffed. A wicked grin was plastered on her face as she sauntered over to your cage. Living in a tropical climate, she was sporting better sleepwear than a stuffy robe: a blood-red tear drop G-string that just barely managed to cover her slit and an equally-red micro triangle bra that similarly barely covered her nipples.

"I've been aware for some time of the rebel faction. I'm not an idiot, you know. My own spies have been working relentlessly to discover any traitors, and they've gotten quite a few over the years." Kibal paused, tapping a claw contemplatively on the surface of the table. "I admit, I find it fascinating that despite my spies' best efforts, there's always one more traitor to catch, one more plot to foil." She snorted. "It doesn't matter; Mira will be interrogated and executed by tomorrow, and you'll be the topping on my favorite desert before I retire to a restful slumber."

She turned to leave, and, desperate to save Mira's life, you shouted out, "Killing us won't stop your real enemy!"

Kibal stopped, glancing over her shoulder as she said, "And why should I believe this little ploy of yours?"

"Because," you said, "Mira's eyes were glazed over when she was talking to me. Unless she's blind, then who's to say she wasn't under some kind of possession spell? Just look at the magic your ruby gives you; I'm betting there's another magic jewel out there."

"Somebody has the emerald..." Kibal said to herself softly, and then remembered you were there. "You still haven't given me a reason to trust you."

"Oh please, I'm going to be eaten alive if I don't gain your favor," was your answer, and it took most of your courage to keep from giving yourself away. "I don't exactly love being a slave, but I'd rather be the pet of a tyrant than suffering forever in some crappy spirit world...assuming I even get that lucky."

Kibal chuckled darkly. "Yes, self-preservation is a powerful motivator. I'd save my own life if our positions were reversed." She tapped her chin pensively. "But what to do about Mira? If she's being possessed, then it's because she's the best avenue through which to attack me. If my enemy were to use you, they'd have to reevaluate every step of their assassination plot and I'd too easily discover a mastermind, because a lowly, enslaved newcomer couldn't cobble together a serious threat against someone like myself."

You were sickened by her ego, but you had to egg her on.

"But, Mistress, if Mira is possessed, then how are you going to confront your true enemy? Entrapping Mira won't work because she'll just be released from the spell."

"Fool," Kibal snapped. "My ruby should be able to magically ensnare whoever is controlling my chambermaid so that I can either banish my enemy's very soul or at least learn their identity while freeing my servant." She paused, thinking. "Yes, I'll do it tomorrow night, when Mira comes to attend my bath. That will be the perfect time to try again to kill me, since the poisonous body rub has failed." Reaching down, she opened your cage and then grasped her ruby again. "You've served me well, pet. I think such...loyalty...deserves a reward."

You gulped. "M-me, Mistress? A reward?"

Kibal nodded, grinning. "Yes, and perhaps more than one. This enemy has pestered me for so long that one small act of repayment seems so little; perhaps three small acts coupled together will suffice? You'll receive the other two soon enough, but for now, be satisfied with the first."

The ruby began to glow steadily, and you were levitated out of the cage. Your raggedy loincloth was effortlessly torn away as you were tossed onto the bed. You only had a moment to scramble into an upright seated position before the bed sucked you in like oil-colored quicksand. Up to your neck in cushion-backed black silk, you looked in wide-eyed fear to Kibal.

"M-mistress?! What is this?!"

She laughed as she replied, "Your reward, my pet. My powers allow me to manipulate many elements in quite a few ways, but none of them have the wonderful feel of expertly-crafted silk. I've been toying with myself often with this method over the past several months, and I can't tell you how exhilarating and relaxing it is." She sighed, almost dreamily. "Silken black tendrils violating your every hole... You have no idea how fortunate you are, pet."

(Due to the graphic nature of this section, the author of this story has edited this scene out. Baisically, you are tentacle raped by her bed sheets.)

As you lay there, helpless and gasping, Kibal chuckled and said, "I hope you enjoyed that, my pet. Rewards of that quality and magnitude don't come often to those I favor. Now get some sleep; I need you rested if you're going to help me protect my crown."

Your strength gone, you passed out into merciful oblivion.
122221221.title: I heard your little conversation with Mira...

1222212212.content:
If that was just your first “reward”, you weren’t sure you wanted to know what she had in mind for the other two. For a while you lay there on the very same sheets you had just been violated by, panting. “Somehow,” You think to yourself, “I have to warn Mira. I just hope I can get to her before Kibal.”


At that moment Kibal comes back into the chamber. “Speak of the devil.” You think. Kibal stares down at you with a wicked smile. “Time to get up, slave.” She says. “You have a long day ahead of you.”


She picks up her black dress and slides it back over her body, making sure her ruby necklace was clearly visible, hanging in front of her breasts. She grasps you in her fist, and exits the room into the halls. “Before I can have any fun with you,” She says, “We have to make sure you don’t have any of that poison left on you.” When she reaches the throne room, she points to one of the guards at the door. You notice that it was the same skunk who found you yesterday.


Kibal lowers you to the floor and the skunk takes your arm. “Take him to the baths and scrub every inch of him from top to bottom.” Kibal orders. The skunk nods and leads you buy the arm through the halls once more. She brings you to a wooden door far too small for Kibal to enter. This bath must be for the slave’s use. Kibal’s own bath would no doubt be much larger and grander.


Inside the room was a round shallow pool about thirty feet wide. At the edge of the pool were various bottles of multi color liquids and brushes, used to bathe no doubt. The skunk sets her spear down and motions for you to remove your clothes. It didn’t take long to do, since all you wore was a loincloth. Of course, you couldn’t remove your bracer because it was magically locked. Maybe you would get lucky and it would rust. Although, you had to admit you felt uncomfortable stripping in front of a woman, even if it was a skunk-woman.


You step into the pool and sit down at the edge. Even sitting down, the water only came up to your stomach. The skunk gets down on her knees behind you and begins scrubbing you with a brush, the rough bristles feel like sandpaper as they rake up and down your back.


“So the poison trick didn’t work?” Asks the skunk. “Nope.” You say, before realizing, “Wait, how do you know about that?!” She quickly covers your mouth with her hand. “My name is Angela. I’m one of the conspirators against Kibal.” She whispers. You move her hand away and whisper “You need to warn Mira. I told Kibal it looked like she was under a spell as she spoke to me last night. Kibal plans to interrogate her when Mira goes to give her a bath.”


Angela nodded. “I will warn her. But first, I must finish with your bath.” She pours some blue liquid from one of the bottles into her hand and begins rubbing it all over you. The oil felt cool on your skin, and smelled of berries. “Why not pretend to have given me a bath and send me back out to her? She’ll no doubt want me in her mouth again.” You ask.


“She’ll likely sniff you when you get back to her to make sure.” Says Angela. “I have to get every last trace of poison off of you, or she’ll suspect me.” She vigorously scrubs your entire body with the brush, making you feel like you were being rubbed with a cactus. You just hope you didn’t lose too much skin.
Finally, Angela finishes scrubbing you and you step out of the bath. You look around and see no towel or anything to dry off with. “Don’t tell me you expect me to stand here until I drip dry.” you say. Angela shakes her head. “Of course not.” Suddenly, her long bushy tail wraps around your body, gently rubbing you up and down, drying you.


You had to admit that you rather enjoyed this. Her fur was thick and soft like a blanket, and felt incredibly warm after standing in the cold air. You were a little disappointed when she stopped. Angela reaches behind her and pulls something out of her belt. It was a knife, with a wooden handle, leather sheath, and a large curved obsidian blade. She hands the knife to you.


“What’s this for?” You ask. “If you ever anger Kibal, or she grows bored of you, she’s bound to eat you. This will give you a means of escape.” Says Angela. “You expect me to cut my way out of her!?” You exclaim. Angela quickly shhhhh’s you with her finger. “You have a better idea?” You shake your head. “Then just take it.”


You strap the sheath around your thigh, covering it with your loincloth. Angela takes you by the arm and leads you out of the room back to Kibal, who is sitting in her throne, staring down at you. Kibal picks you up between her fingers and holds you up to her nose. Just as Angela said, she sniffs you, making sure you don’t still smell of poison.


With a satisfied grunt, she placed you on the armrest of her throne, propping her head up on her fist. “I have to deal with a few traitors today, so just stay put and keep your mouth shut.” She says. “Send the first one in.”


The entrance doors to the throne room open, and through them enters two guards, dragging a young male husky by his arms. He is dressed similarly to you, wearing only a loincloth and bracer. The guards bring him to the center of the room, and force him down onto his knees. “This one was caught trying to escape Mistress.” Says one of the guards.”


The husky boy is shaking like a leaf as he stares up at Kibal, who smiles evilly. “Well now, what punishment would befit such an ungrateful slave?” Kibal wonders aloud. The husky looks about ready to wet himself as Kibal taps a finger to her chin. Her face lights up as she suddenly has a wicked idea.


“Shave him!” She orders. “Then take him into the jungle and throw him in the thorn patch. Take him back to the slave quarters after he’s crawled out, and leave any thorns he has in him.” The husky flails and cries as the guards grab him by the arms and drag him away. You were about to say how Kibal had given him too harsh a punishment, but quickly decided not to after thinking that she could come up with something far worse for you.


You quickly came to realize that Kibal’s cruelty knew no boundary. Most of the punishments she gave out were to slaves who tried to escape or refused to obey orders. One of them she ordered to be hung upside-down by his ankles over a pool of boiling water and slowly dunked and raised from it fifty times.
Another she ordered to be used as a scratching post by the feline guards. One of her guards had been caught steeling from the vaults, so Kibal ordered her hands chopped off. But the worst one of all came not with a slave or guard, but with a citizen. A mouse-woman was dragged into the throne room, her feet scraping the floor as the guards held her arms over her head. “This one was found to have aided in your attempted poisoning, Mistress.”


Kibal scowled. “So, yet another conspirator trying to assassinate me. There is only one punishment for that.” She grins evilly, showing her wicked sharp teeth. You immediately know what’s coming. “Do you have any last words?”


To your surprise, the mouse doesn’t look afraid at all. That, or she’s hiding it very well. She stands up straight and defiant. “Yes. Killing me will only rally others to our cause. No matter how many of us you kill, there will always be more to end your tyranny and restore the rightful queen.”


Kibal laughed. “Even if you could stop me, how would you ever regain my bitch of a sister as queen? I turned that whore to stone with my necklace. If I die, the jewel’s power dies with me, and nothing will revive her. Now then, time for my mid-morning snack.”


The guards who brought in the mouse grab her and shove her forward. Kibal picks the mouse up between her fingers and raises her up to her face. Kibal sticks her tongue out and licks the mouse girl, tasting her, but the mouse bites her on the tongue, hard.


Kibal lets out a sudden gasp and wretches in pain, quickly pulling her tongue away, and covering her mouth with her hand. She glares at the mouse and growls. “Big mistake.” she says, voice filled with malice. “I was just going to swallow you, but now……..”


Kibal opened her mouth wide, blasting the mouse with her foul breath. The mouse girl still showed no fear, staring into the cavernous mouth that was soon to be her doom with the utmost defiance on her face. You couldn’t help but admire her for that.


Finally, Kibal tossed the mouse into her mouth, and brought her jaws slamming down with a sickening crunch that made you flinch. To make it even worse, there was even more crunching as she chewed. The horrid sound sent a chill through your body, each one seeming to echo through the room. Finally, Kibal tilted her head back and swallowed, sending the remains of the brave mouse-girl to their final resting place.


You felt nauseas after watching such a gruesome display. You nearly vomit, but force yourself to hold it down. “Any more offenders for me to deal with?” Kibal asks. “That’s all Mistress.” Replies one of the guards. “Good.” Says Kibal, leaning back in her throne. “All this punishment puts me in the mood for some entertainment.” She looks down at you.
1222212212.title: You tough it out; Kibal must be overthrown

She puts you in her mouth.

"Oh, you taste-" is all she can say before she spits you out and collapses dead.
Mina comes in, "You did it, I'll announce the death of the empress, you did great." she says.
She leaves the room to spread word to the kingdom.
"Glad that's over." you say.

122221222.title: "Time for my morning treat."

choices: "I choose.........neither! I'm getting out of here!
13.content:
On the throne before you, sits a giant anthro dragon! Her scales are dark red, with her belly and chest being yellow. Her wings are at least fifty feet wide, with the webbing between them yellow also. Her fingers and toes are tipped with curved, black claws. She wears no clothes, other than a silk skirt that goes down to her knees.

"Come closer." She said. You approach her step by step. She bent over and lowered her hand, palm up. You timidly climb into her hand, and she lifts you up to her face. "Why are you here?" She asks.

You tell her how you were thrown overboard in the storm. "I see." She says. "Well, until I can decide what to do with you, you will be kept in my chambers.." She lowers you onto the floor. "Take him to my bed chamber." She orders her guards.

The guards lead you out of the throne room, down a massive hallway. You come to a pair of twin golden doors, the guards each push one open, and lead you into the bedroom. Everything in the room is ten times your size! The bed is big enough to be an aircraft carrier!

The guards pull out a bamboo ladder from under the bed, and motion for you to climb it. You start climbing the ladder up the side of the bed, a task that takes you about ten minutes. When you reach the top, all you see is a vast desert of satin sheets. You walk over to the edge, feet sinking into the soft bed.

You look down and see the two guards standing at the bottom. "Stay right here!" One of them yells up to you. "The Empress will be with you soon!"

You lay back on the bed, sinking into the mattress. The bed is so soft that you fall asleep, after all you've been through. You wake up to a giant scaled finger poking you. You turn and see the dragoness is laying beside you. "Sleep well?" She asks, smiling.

You sit up, marveling at how truly huge she is. "Well, I've decided to give you a choice." She says. "I need someone to watch over my eggs. Someone to keep them warm and safe, and feed them after they hatch. So, you can be my royal egg watcher. Or, you could be my little pet. You'll keep me company and you'll be taken good care of. So what'll it be?"

You weigh both options, deciding wich would be better. Finally, you come to a decision.
13.title: Arkair, the dragoness

choices: You wake up and the flames are still burning
Oh no! The fire burned out!
131.content:
"Splendid!" She says as she picks you up, places you in her palm, and carries you out of the room. You marvel at the palace halls as she carries you. Marble columns support the ceiling, intricate paintings cover the walls, depicting other anthro women in various stories. She stops between two columns and presses her hand against the wall.

The wall swings back to reveal a hidden passage! The passage is lined with torches, and a spiraling staircase going down below the palace. She begins descending the stairs, your eyes adjusting to the dim light. When she reaches the bottom of the stairs, you see a clutch of six eggs, each of them as big as an SUV.

She sets you down on the floor, and gather all of her eggs into a group. Then, she places them in the middle of the room, in the the center of a pile of wood. She opens her mouth and a jet of flame shoot out, igniting the wood.

"Now, make sure that fire stays burning. It will keep my hatchlings warm, and also determine their gender. I would prefer that you keep it at high heat, as I want them to be female." She points to the corner, and you see an enormous stock of wood for the fire. "Restock the flame every few hours or so." She continues. "That should keep it hot enough. I'll send some dinner down for you later. Bye!" And she leaves.

You sit and stare at the fire, hoping you don't screw this up. If you don't follow her orders, you don't want to think what she could do. As the flames glow, you see the eggs become somewhat transparent. You can make out the silouhetes of the baby dragons inside. You really hope that when they hatch, they don't mistake you for their first meal.

After some horus of watching them, you restock the flames, and lay down and fall asleep.
131.title: "I'll be your egg watcher."

1311.content:
You sigh in relief upon seeing that the fire is still burning. You walk over to it feed it a little, making it stronger. You sit down again but then hear a cracking sound. One of the eggs is hatching! You see the snout of a dragon poke through the shell, and then notice the other eggs are beginning to hatch as well. One by one they emerge from their eggs and fall onto the floor. They start to open their eyes and sniff around around a little. You move back, unintentionally catching their attention. One of them looks in your direction and starts crawling toward you. The others follow behind and soon they have you surrounded. As they move closer you flinch but they don't try to hurt you. Instead you are pushed to ground as they dog pile on top of you. They roll around together with you caught in the middle until you fall onto your stomach.

A booming sound draws closer and closer until Akair's scaly feet appear in front of you. You look up at the dragoness but she's not looking at you. Her gaze is fixed on the dragons playing together behind you. There's a smile on her face as she steps over you to get to her children. One by one she picks them up and inspects them. "All of them are female, I guess you did your job." she says. Then she picks you up and carries you off with her children. She enters her bed chamber and places her children on the bed, but simply tosses you down. "Now since you succeeded in your task you will be given a new job." she begins. "From now on you will help me take care of them as their caregiver." She just basically made you a nanny. Before you can respond to her one of them pounces on you and licks your hair. "It seems they've already become attached to you anyway." Akair notes. Maybe its because you're the first thing they saw after hatching. When Akair sits down they go to her as well. Even though you hatched them, they still know who their mother is.

From then on you help Akair raise the dragons. At first she expected them to eat you when they were big enough, but it seems they were too attached to you. You also notice that they mature a lot quicker than humans. They grow so much in a few short years. At what stage will we follow the story?
1311.title: Six Hatchlings

13111.content:
Its been a couple of years since the girls were born. She ended up naming them Amelia, Cheryl, Henrietta, Krystal, Gina, and Dahlia. You've been helping Akair take care of them ever since. A short while after they hatched some of the other subjects felt that someone more capable should do it, but the girls were already too attached to you. You played with them all the time and watched them when Akair had duties to perform. Early on in their lives they would all cuddle with you and dog pile on top of you. As time passed you saw that they matured faster than humans, and they went from babies to children in just a couple of years.

One day you are napping in your bed peacefully. A low rumbling stirs you from your sleep and you find yourself being prodded by someone's claw. You wake up to see Amelia smiling down at you. She looks like the rest of her sisters except for her hair, which is shoulder length. "Good morning!" she says cheerfully. She and her sisters are much larger now. When they hatched they were about the size of large cars, but now you're about the size of a doll to them. Soon Henrietta's face pops in next to hers and she reaches down to scratch your head. She's got short hair that comes down to her neck. It feels pretty good but you shoo her claw away after a second. She giggles at the look on your face. "I told you not to do that!" you tell her with a sigh. "But you enjoy it, I know you do! You always look so happy when I do it!" she says. You look away slightly in a huff. You can't deny t feels good when she scratches you but it makes you feel like a dog or something. All of the girls care for you deeply like family, but sometimes Henrietta treats you like a pet.

You stand up and stretch your arms when another hand shoots out and grabs you. You are brought to the grinning face of Cheryl. Her hair is shoulder length but she keeps it wild and messy. "Lets have a lot of fun today, okay?" she says and grabs one of your arms with her claws. She moves it up and down until you are snatched away by Krystal. Krystal has her hair worn in two pigtails. She loves to dote over you because she thinks you're the cutest thing in the world. "Be more careful with him Cheryl!" she says while brushing you off. She then hands you off to Dahlia, who holds you to in both hands and gives you a warm smile. "Good morning." she says softly. Her hair is worn in a single pony tail. Dahlia was always a shy one, and the only ones she was really comfortable around are her mother, her sisters and you. Gina walks up and interrupts. "What do you guys want to do today? Mommy said she was attending to official duties, so we get to spend the day with him." Gina is the most serious of them all. She looks up to her mother a lot and hopes to be a great empress as well. She even wears her hair exactly the same as Akair, down to her back and nice and straight.

Dahlia carries you away from your bed, now holding you to her chest like some sort of stuffed animal. The six of them share one bedroom, with you sleeping there as well. When it was time to give them their own room the cried at the thought of being separated from you and their mother. The solution Akair came up with was to put you in the room to calm them down. You were given a small bed that now sits sits on a table near their own beds. "I want to play some games!" Cheryl says and claps her hands. "I know a good one!" Krystal says. It seems like all of them have an idea so you have to be the tie breaker. Who decides on what you're doing first?
13111.title: Dragon Kids

choices: One of them is a male
1312.content:
You wake to see the eggs surrounded by smoldering wood. "Oh no!" You say. You frantically try to get another fire started. You take two sticks from the wood pile and rub them together, trying desperatley to start another fire. Sooner or later someone outside would notice no smoke coming from the hole in the ceiling and realize the flames had gone out. You needed to get a fire going and quickly!

Finally, after what seems like hours you finally get a spark going. You blow on it gently to get it to grow bigger. After throwing more wood on the fire, you finally get it going again. You sigh in relief and sit back down, exhausted.

You hear footsteps coming down the stair. You turn to see a skunk amazon with a bowl of soup. She hands you the bowl and turns to leave. This must be your dinner. You take the wooden spoon in the soup and taste it. It tastes almost like chicken soup, except it has a bit of a spicy taste to it. Some sort of herb they grow on the island?

Then, Arkair comes down to check on you. "So, how are my eggs doing?" She asks. "Fine." You say, hoping she doesn't see the flames are a little low. Just then, you hear a cracking sound. You turn to see one of the eggs is splitting!

"Oh good!" Says the queen smiling. "They're hatching." One by one the eggs crack, and out crawl six baby dragons, red like their mother. They are about three feet long and crawl on all fours like a lizard. You guess they'll walk on two legs when they grow.

Arkair begins picking them up one at a time, and checking to see if they are female. A bead of sweat runs down your forehead. You pray they are all girls.
1312.title: Oh no! The fire burned out!

When she inspects the last one, she frowns slightly. "Hmmm, this one is a male. It would seem you let the fire get too low." She turns to you. You gulp, dreading what punishment she might give you.

"Since it was your responsibility to keep the flames going, you must deal with the consequences." Strangely, she dosn't raise her voice, or seem visibly upset.

"Therefore, you shall....."
13122.title: One of them is a male

131222.content:

She hands you the male baby.

"Now head to the nursery and take care of him. Fortunately for you, I'm heading there to care for my daughter." she says.

She glares at you though as you and her head to the nursery.
131222.title: "Have the duty of raising this one yourself...

choices: "The empress would like a word with you."
"I'm afraid your welcome here has worn out."
132.content:
For the next few weeks, you were Arkair's personal pet. Like she promised, you were taken good care of. You were fed three times a day. The food was a little strange though. You were given water, strange fruits of all kinds, and a spicy tasting meat that you couldn't identify.

You were allowed to come and go as you pleased. You would spend most of the day exploring the city. It was a true wonder to behold. The buildings were a mix between Roman and Mayan architecture. With marble columns, and carved walls.

When it was time for bed, you would curl up on Arkair's stomach, and she would stroke you until you fell asleep. All in all, it wasn't a bad life.

The island seemed to contain anthro animals of all kinds. From birds to reptiles, from canines to felines. There was one however, that did make you uneasy. A skunk named Lorana.

She was one of the palace guards, and didn't seem to like you very much. When ever you walked past her, she would glare at you with a contemptuous sneer. She wore the standard guard wear, blue skirt, breastplate, and a spear with a golden spearhead. Something gave you the feeling she would like nothing more than to hang you from that spear like a flag.

You're sitting on Arkair's shoulder as she sits on her throne one day, and she notices you look rather worried. "What's wrong little one?" She asks. "It's one of your guards. That Lorana." You reply. "Every time I see her she looks at me like she wants to kill me."

"She probably does." Says Arkair. "Lorana hates outsiders. Her only loyalty is to me. She trusts no one else. Were you not my pet, she would kill you on sight." You gulp.

"But don't worry." She says reassuringly. "As long as you are under my protection, she wouldn't dare harm you." Later, you are strolling through the halls of the palace, when you hear a voice behind you. "Hey! Human!"

You turn and feel your heart sink. It's Lorana! She walks toward you, face in a scowl. You are too scared to move as she comes closer. When she reaches you, she stares down at you from her ten foot height, and says..........
132.title: "I'll be your pet."

choices: Yell at them to get thier attention
run past them and hope that they see you
1322.content:
Your eyes widen in fear as the amazon skunk slowly moves toward you, a smirk on her face. You gulped, "W-w-what do you mean? Arkair did'nt say anything about me leaving." Lorana scoffed, and said "Don't play dumb with me, human. You know exactly what I mean. I'm tired of you getting the glory from our mistress when I should be the one in her praise!" You backed away in fear. "I-i never meant for you to be mad! I was going to die if I i didnt cooperate!" lorana just laughed, "Well, now you just moved up the scheduele." Then you did what all people who see an amazon thats about to kill them, you ran.
"Help! I'm being attacked by an amazon skunk who trying to kill me!" lorana was following just behind you, "GET BACK HERE HUMAN!!!" All the amazons turned to see a bloodshot eyed skunk with her teeth bared, chasing their mistresses royal pet. "Lorana, what are you doing?!" a anthro tiger yelled, "Get away from Arkair's pet!" lorana just screamed at them all to shut up.

As you ran down the hall, getting very tired, you noticed that lorana was getting closer. You saw two gaurds at arkair's door, you then....
1322.title: "Oh yeah? well.....run!"

choices: It's the two guards dragging Lorana by the arms
13221.content:
"Guards!" You yell. "Pet in danger! Pet in danger!" The two guards, a panther and a wolf, instantly rush forward, past you, and towards Lorana. The hold out their spears, pointing them at Lorana's throat as she skids to stop.


"You dare attack the empresses' royal pet?" Sneers the wolf. "That's treason!"


"You're going to suffer big time for this." Growls the panther. Lorana snarls and raises her spear. "You'll have to stop me first!"


As all three of them lunge forward, Lorana lifts her tail, and a noxious green gas fills the room. The only thing you can see is green fog. And the smell. Oh god, the smell. Maybe Lorana won't kill you after all. Maybe her gas will make you gag to death for her.


You hear the sounds of the three amazons tearing and slashing at each other. You clamp a hand over your mouth and nose as you blindly feel you way around for Arkair's door.


You finally find the door and push it open. There sits Arkair on her bed, reading scroll, the amazons' form of books. She looks up from her scroll and smiles. "Hello, my pet. What do you........" She stops mid-sentence as she sees the green fog in the doorway behind you. "What's going on?"


"Lorana." You say between gasps, exhausted from running and holding your breath. "You were wrong.......... She did try to........... attack me.............. Your guards are...........fighting her."


Arkair leans down and picks you up, sitting you on her shoulder. "It's okay." She says soothingly. "You're safe now." You both look at the door to see a dark shape coming out of it towards you.
13221.title: Yell at them to get thier attention

132212.content:
You looked out towards the doors and saw the dark figure of the one person who you knew very well now, blood dripping from her spear and face, having her teeth glare in a rage.

Lorana was still alive....
Alive...but weak. She was impaled in the chest by one of the spears of the guards that was at the gate. Her eyes burned with rage as if almost the devil had taken her soul. She staggered some, looking up, half of her face was torn, showing the muscle of it. Pumping...Moving...Being A Horrid Sight.
"Y-You!" Her voice croaked as she staggered closer towards you and Arkair, with blood dripping from both wounds. "You stole her from me.... Now YOU PAY!" She started to sprint while making a blood-curling cry. That was until she stopped when a spear was thrown at her waist.
Turns out the Panther was still alive. Torn up a little less than Lorana but still in horrible shape. She slowly creeped towards you with her spear ready to be tossed until another spear was thrown, impaling her hand. She stopped for a moment, then she....
132212.title: It's Lorana, bloodstained and grinning

choices: "I give up. I'll do whatever you want."
"I would rather die than play servant boy to a bunch of freaks like you!"
133.content:
You turn and try to run across the bed, but you are instantly blocked by her hand. "No no." She says. "I can't let you leave. You see, we have remained hidden from humans for a long time. And we want it to stay that way."

"But I have to get home!" You protest. "I have a life! A family! You must understand!"

"I understand." She says. "But my duties as empress come first. So you'll have to stay here."

You bury your face in your hands. You'll never see your friends and family again! On top of that, you're stuck as a pet to these animals.

"So, what'll it be?" She says expectingly.
133.title: "I choose.........neither! I'm getting ...

1331.content:
You felt your hope shatter into tiny pieces as you knew she wasn't going to let you go home. She looked at you expecting an answer but she didn't say anything and let you think over your decision for a few minutes.

You couldn't decide. Either way you couldn't go home. Maybe both jobs had benefits? Maybe you could use one to your advantage?

"I give up. I'll do whatever you want" you sighed.

The Giantess looked at you and petted your head with one of her fingers.
She put one of her fingers to he muzzle and tapped a few times deciding what you would be.

She smiled and said "You shall be my..
1331.title: "I give up. I'll do whatever you want.&...

1332.content:
You really shouldn't have said that. She glares at you angrily. "Fine. If that's the way you want it." She picks you up between her fingers and holds you over her mouth. "No! I didn't mean it!" You say, but she ignores you.

She drops you into her open mouth and her jaws slam shut around you. You can't see anything, but you feel her hot breath and her wet tongue rolling you around, savoring your taste.

Then she tilts her head back and you slide down her throat, the fleshy walls squeezing you and forcing you down into her stomach. You land with a plop in the pit of her gut. "Enjoy your new home." She says. "Your gonna be there for a while. We dragons take about a day to digest our food."

Around you, you see the skeletons of past victims of her stomach. You pray to avoid the same fate. Then, your prison shifts as she lies back on her bed, and began to snore.

You've really gotten yourself into a mess now! Now, you can either try to crawl back up her throat and out her mouth, of course then you would have to figure out another escape plan to get out of here.

Or, you can pray that when she wakes up, she'll be in a better mood and willing to let you out.

Which shall it be?
1332.title: "I would rather die than play servant boy t...

choices: "Take him to my chamberssssssss. I have planssssss for thissssss one."
14.content:
There, coiled on the throne, sits the strangest creature you've ever seen. She appears to be a snake of some kind, except the has arms! Her upper body is almost human, except it is covered in scales. Her head is that of a snake as well, with a large hood spread out around it. Below her waist, she has no legs, only a long scaly tail.

Her scales are a deep blue color, with her under belly being yellow. She speaks in a hissing voice. "Come here." She says. You timidly approach her throne. Her forked tongue flicks in and out of her mouth. She can smell your fear.

"Who are you?" She asks. You tell her your name and how you ended up here. "Sssssssssssso." She says, rolling her S's. "You come from the human world? Well then, there isssssssss only one thing we do with humansssssssss."

You pray that whatever they do, it doesn't involve you dying, or being eaten, or both. She turns to her guards and orders.....
14.title: Kina, the cobra

141.content:
The guards escort you out of the throne room, and through the palace halls. You walk in front of them, with them nudging you with their spears. As you walk, you notice the architecture of the palace. Columns line the hallway, with the walls containing egyptian-like paintings and symbols.

You come to two massive black doors with more carvings on them.The two guards push them open and lead you inside. The room is an enormous stone chamber, lit by a hanging chandelier. In the center is a velvet pillow big enough to be a field on its own.

The guards leave and you climb onto the pillow, waiting for the empress, and praying that she is merciful. About an hour later, the doors open and the empress slithers in. She wraps her body in circles, surrounding you.

"My name isssssss Kina." She hisses. "I might just have ssssssome usssssse for you. Do assssss I ssssssay, and you will be allowed to sssssstay here. Underssssstand?" You nod. What other choice do you have.?

"Excellent." She says happily. "Here'sssss the deal. All you have to do is be my little sssssservant. Just do asssss you're told, and you will be taken care of."

For the next week, you do what ever Kina tells you to do. You are given your own quarters, a room that would be small to those amazons, but to you, it's big enough to be a house. You sleep on a pile of wool, provided by the local sheep girls. When you wake up, you are brought breakfast, then you report to Kina to be given your tasks for the day.

You never know what these tasks will be. They could be to deliver letters to her guards, polish their armor, deliver her meals, or even clean the throne room! It can be exhausting, being at your size, but you don't complain. Kina isn't cruel to you, and if it gives you a home, you may as well do it.

One night after your dinner, you are summoned to Kina once again. "What is it?" You ask. "I have just one more tasssssk for you today." She hisses. "And what would that be?"
141.title: "Take him to my chamberssssssss. I have pla...

1412.content:
You give her a confused look. "But I've never really cooked before, I don't know how to make food." you reply, hoping that will be enough to convince her that you can't perform this task.

She gazes at you with her beady, snake eyes as her tongue darts in and out of her mouth. "You don't know how to cook eh?" she says as she slithers towards him. "Then fine, I guesssssssssss it'sssssssss time you learned how to hunt." she says.

Kina then turns towards one of her handmaidens and gives her a subtle gesture and as her maiden knows what she means, she quickly leaves the room. "Sssssarloc will be getting you what you need 'human.' she says, really emphasizing the word 'human' for some reason.

You continue to sit there and wonder what exactly she meant by that but all you can do is watch and wait for Sarloc to return with whatever it is that you'll need to go hunting with.

And it's not long after that she returns with two objects, a crown and something else.
1412.title: "Feed me my dinner"

14122.content:
When you see the bow, you know that makes perfect sense to have if you're going to be out hunting, but the crown certainly throws you for a loop. "Just what is that for?" you ask as you point at it.

Kina picks up the crown which oddly has a solid gold snake sticking out of the top of it. It's eyes red and you almost swear they were glowing. "Thissssss human let'ssssss everything that'ssssss out there know that you are with ussssss." Kina states.

As she explains this you nod your head. 'Great, now I'm being collared by this thing.' you think to yourself as you don't dare let her know that's exactly how you feel.

"And when you're done, bring your catch back and one of my cooksssss with get it ready for ussssss." Kina states while you nod your head in understanding.

You place the crown on your head and when you do, you feel a strange tingling go through your body but you brush it off. Picking up the bow, you head out into the wilderness hoping mainly to survive.
14122.title: Bow

141221.content:
To be honest, you feel a lot more confident about your abilities of Kina was sending you out there to go hunt some food for her. Although there's still that nagging part in your mind that this is all a set up for you to be devoured by some hungry beast out there.

"I'll prove that I am worthy of them keeping me alive." You say with determination ready your bow and start returning to the jungle.

As you search through the jungle for anything that you might be able to shoot down with your bow, you are still pretty timid, jumping at every noise you hear as well as turning your head at even the slightest rustling of a bush.

Eventually you keep looking and your confidence is beginning to increase a little bit. Although you don't really notice how you seem to be getting taller, gaining a foot and a half in height making you seven feet tall.

Finally you come across a creature that you are confident enough that you can take on and kill to bring back, despite it being larger than you. What kind of creature is it?
141221.title: Heading Out

14122121.content:
You hear another rustling coming from a bush which suddenly stops. You turn around to face that bush with your bow at the ready as you aim it, just in case something were to pop out of there and attack.

And it turns out your premonitions did indeed come true as an elevent foot tall anthro pig pops out from behind the large bush and lets out a bellowing roar that's very unbecoming of a pig. "Well this is a place of giant creatures so I shouldn't be surprised by that." you say to yourself.

The giant anthro pig lets out another roar and begins charging at you. Normally you'd be afraid of something like this charging at you but you seem to be full of this newfound confidence. As the pig is coming closer towards you, you point the bow right at it's heart.

Just as the giant pig makes a huge leap at you, you fire right at it's chest and watch as the arrow pierces his heart, causing him to fall down to the ground which makes a loud crash and the ground shake.

You leap up in triumph, not believing what you had accomplished. "Kina will no doubt be pleased with this." you say to yourself, not even noticing how your voice has risen in pitch.
14122121.title: Yes

141221211.content:
However as excited as you are, there's just one small problem. How are you going to bring a catch this heavy back to the palace all by yourself?

Sighing to yourself, you figure you might just try and drag it. Grabbing it's body by the legs, you start to pull and you're actually amazed at how well you're able to pull this thing. "Maybe I can get it back to the palace afterall." you say to yourself excitedly and continue pulling.

What you didn't realize was that you grew another foot in height as well as gained enormous strength in comparison so it was rather easy for you to drag the carcass of the antro-pig back to the palace.

Once you reach the front door, some of Kina's guards are astounded that you were not only able to survive, but kill something and bring it back. "Niccccceely done human. I can ssssssse why she chosssssse you." one of them says.

You just nod and continue to haul the carcass inside the palace until you bring it to the throne room and place it before Kina. "Does this meet your standards?" you ask.

Kina gets up from her throne and slithers over to you to inspect the carcass.
141221211.title: Taking the Catch Back

1412212111.content:
As Kina looks over your kill, her mouth breaks into a smile, her sharp crystal white fangs being shown off while her yellow snake eyes glow with pride. "Very nicccccely done human. I knew there wasssss a reasssssson why I chossssssse you." she replies.

And when you recieve this praise from her, you can't help but feel proud of yourself since you kind of figured that she would be a tough one to please.

While you were basking in your glory moment, you failed to notice how your height once again shoots up even more than before, making you stand up at ten feet tall. But it was another change that went completely unnoticed. The crown that's currently on your head began to get smaller so that it resembled a circlet, or a tiara even.

You watch as Kina devours the pig, swallowing about three quarters of it before finally taking a bite and chewing it up before swallowing it. "The ressssssst isssssss yourssssss. Conssssssider it your reward." she offers.

You're a little surprised that she's giving you this but you know there's no way that you could eat this much. But you still don't want to offend her.
1412212111.title: She's Pleased

14122121111.content:
And it certainly doesn't help for you that it doesn't really seem that appealing to you considering that it's not even cooked. But the more you stare at it, the more it starts to look tasty.

You don't even know what's wrong with you but you suddenly start to walk over to it and open your mouth to begin digging in. Due to your new, height and bodymass. It's no trouble for you to devour it whole. "Wow, I didn't know I could do that." you say aloud.

And it certainly helped that your inscisors had formed into a pair of very sharp fangs, making piercing through and chewing up the carcass that much easier. When you're done you lick your lips. "Wow, that was actually really good." you say to yourself.

Kina certainly noticed the new fangs you had when you opened your mouth. 'He's certainly coming along nicely.' she thinks to herself.

She then makes her way over to you and wraps one of her arms around your shoulders. "So how would you like to go with me to a performance of our kind?" she asks.
14122121111.title: Eat It

141221211111.content:
You think about her offer and if this were any other circumstance you wouldn't really be interested but since offending her would most likely mean your death, plus you don't really have anything else to do anyway, you take her up on her offer. "Sure that sounds good." you reply.

Kina smiles at you as her tongue slides past her lips. "Then follow me thisssss way human." she says as she leads you down a hallway.

As you start to follow her down the hallway she had pointed out, you start to feel a strange itch across your chest and you reach under your shirt to scratch it. When it refuses to go away, you take your shirt off and it makes you feel better. "Ah that did it." you say.

If you would've looked down, you would see that your skin is starting to turn a bluish color and it looks a little bit scaly which was causing the itching.
141221211111.title: Yes

1412212111111.content:
As Kina leads you through the halls, she begins to explain exactly what kind of show that you'll be attending. "It'sssssss a very ancient tradition of my people. I think it will do you good to watch it." she says.

You see then entrance to what appears to be an auditorium but instead you see her slithering up a ramp so you decide to follow her. It's a little hard for you to keep your balance since it is a little steep but you do manage to keep up.

Once you reach the top of the ramp, you see that you're now on a balcony overlooking the entire stage and Kina takes a seat on a large ornate chair. "Come sssssssit next to me." she says as she pats the empty chair next to her.

Nodding your head, you take a seat where she had gestured to and when you sit down, you notice that it feels like it's padded and step off to look at it but when you take a look, you see that there's nothing there. 'Must be my mind getting to me.' you think to yourself.

In reality, your hips had begun widening as well as your backside becoming much more fuller and riper which would make it feel like you were sitting on a cushion. And now it's time for the show to start.
1412212111111.title: Showtime

14122121111111.content:
You hear the sounds of applause as the curtain rises and two giant anthro cobras, these with green scales as opposed to the blue ones of Kina, take the stage and give a bow.

"I'm not ssssssure about your about your culture human but it isssss cussssstomary to bow before performing." she reveals as you nod your head to let her know you understand.

And then you watch as the two cobras start doing some sort of ritualistic dance, their tails tying together at their ends while they girate their bodies and wave their arms in strange twisting patterns.

While you're watching this, every inch of skin on your body begins to turn blue and you look down and notice this. 'Must be getting really cold in here.' you think to yourself.

That too is also beginning to change as the blood in your body begins to cool off, getting colder. This doesn't go unnoticed by Kina. "He'ssssss coming along niccccccely.' she thinks to herself.
14122121111111.title: Watching the Show

141221211111111.content:
And then, almost as soon as it began, the two anthro cobras finished their ritualistic dance as they break away from each other and head to opposite sides of the stage. You hear the sounds of thunderous applause and you can't help but join in as you stand up and clap along with the crowd.

The performers then take a bow before heading backstage and you sit back down next to Kina. "That was actually a very good performance. I was greatly impressed." you say to her.

Kina looks down at you and smiles. "Yesssss, I thought you would enjoy that little performanccccce." she says and then grins even wider when she sees the next change occur to you.

Like all of the other changes you had gone through thus far, this one goes completely unnoticed. As you were smiling, the rest of your teeth became much larger and and sharper while the muscles of your mouth finished widening to allow you to open your jaw as wide as possible.

Looking outside, Kina notices the darkness and realizes it's time for them to head to bed for the evening. "Let usssss head to our chambersssssss." she says.
141221211111111.title: Show Ends

1412212111111111.content:
You think about it for a moment and after yawning, you decide that heading to bed doesn't sound too bad after all. "Actually Kina that sounds like a pretty good idea." you reply.

She nods her head at your response. "Alright then human, follow me to the ressssssting chambersssss." she says as she gets up from her seat and starts walking back into the main part of her palace.

Along the way, she points out places, almost like giving you a tour as she leads you around to where the sleeping chambers are. "And that'ssssss my mother the late queen Ssssserata." she says as she points out the last painting.

Finally she takes you into one room and then turns to face you. "Thisssssss issss where you'll be sssssssleeeeping. Have sssssweet dreamssssss human." she says before leaving to head to her own chambers.

While you take in just how nice this room is as it's fit for royalty, your body continues changing as your fingernails begin extending and sharpening a little bit.
1412212111111111.title: Getting Ready for Bed

14122121111111111.content:
You step forward and marvel at just how ornate and decorated this room is. "It looks like it almost belongs to someone of royalty." you say to yourself as you begin looking around to see what cool things you can find.

During your search however, there's something that bothers you about the way it's decorated and the things you're finding. "If I didn't know better, I'd swear this bedroom would belong to a woman." you say to yourself.

However, you don't have a lot of time to dwell on it since you're beginning to find yourself getting very sleepy. "I'll just worry about it in the morning." you decide as you climb into the giant bed and pull the silk sheets up over your body and begin your sleeping.

It's not long after that you begin slipping into sweet sleepy bliss and you're out like a light. During the night, your changes accelerate as you didn't even bother to remove the now-tiara from your head. Your entire body has turned blue and become even more itchier.

Meanwhile, back in Kina's chambers, she too falls asleep with a smile on her face knowing that by the end of the day tomorrow, she will have a daughter and princess.
14122121111111111.title: Bedtime

141221211111111111.content:
When you wake up the next morning you give a yawn and a stretch before sitting up in your luxurious bed. Normally you'd feel great around this time of day but right now, you feel very itchy and start scratching your body. "This shirt is really causing me some issues." you say to yourself as you take off your shirt. "That's much better." you mutter as you get out of bed.

What you're too tired to realize, and even if you weren't you still wouldn't think anything of it, is that your skin has shifted to where there are even more layers and resemble scales more than normal human skin as every piece of hair on your body, save for your head, has completely vanished.

The thing that you're most concerned with at the moment is taking your morning shower so that you don't stink and potentially offend Kina since in your mind, the chances of you spending the rest of your life inside her stomach are still very possible.

However the problem with that is that you have no idea where to even begin looking for it and soon you find yourself lost just wondering where it could be.

Before too long though, you see one of the royal guards approaching you. "Isssssss there anything I can help you with young ssssssir?" she asks.

You nod your head at her. "Actually there is thank you. For the life of me I just can't be able to seem to find the shower anywhere and I want to make myself presentable for Kina." you reply.

The guard nods her head. "Follow me pleasssse." she says as she waves for you to follow.
141221211111111111.title: The Next Morning

14122121111111111121.content:
Kina had made sure to get herself up before you did so that she could go and see how the changes are progressing and catch up on what she had missed during the night. 'I can't wait to see how my new daughter is coming along.' she thinks to herself as she rubs her taloned hands together.

And she happened to miss some more changes as you were being led down the hallways towards where the shower is. Your face is starting to take on more of a feminine looks as your lips puff out a bit and your eyes get wider and more inviting. However most startling was that your eyes now have slits in them instead of pupils, giving you snake eyes.

"The ssssssshower issssss right thisssss way ssssssir." one of the guards says as he leads you even further down the corridor in the palace.

And then suddenly you come face to face with Kina who looks down at you with pride as she sees that the changes are really starting to come along nicely with you. "Hello again deary. How are you feeling today?" she asks.

You nod your head at her. "I'm actually doing very well today Kina thank you for asking." you reply.

Kina is all smiles as she continues to look you over. 'The scales are coming in nicely and his eyes are a thing of beauty, just like mine.' she thinks to herself.

"Anyway I wasssss wanting to take you out today and wasssss thinking about helping you get ready." she continues speaking.

And by coincidnece that's exactly where you were heading to do. "Actually Kina that was my exact plans." You reply.

Does she offer her help with this?
14122121111111111121.title: Kina

141221211111111111211.content:
Kina starts to smile even wider and her tongue slithers in and out of her mouth. "Well then how about I give you a hand with that?" she suggests.

You think about it for a little bit, rubbing your chin with your elongated talons, not realizing that your fangs finish growing out into sharp points that are a few inches in length. Do you accept her offer?
141221211111111111211.title: Yes

1412212111111111112111.content:
For some reason, you're really beginning to love the idea of being around Kina more and more and what you don't know but she does is that a bond is building between the two of you that keeps getting stronger and stronger the more time that passes by.

"Sure Kina, that would actually be great." you reply.

She nods her head at this and starts to walk in a different direction than you were heading. "Then let ussssss go thissss way." she says and then dismisses the guards.

You start following behind her and you look back to see the guards walking away in another direction. "Where are they headed?" you ask as your hips start widening.

Kina looks back over her shoulder to see what you're referring to and then turns back towards you. "Oh I sssssent them away sssssince I would like to take care of you myssssself." she replies.

When she tells you this, it makes you feel a little bit more special, almost like you're someone very important to her. "Wow thank you Kina, that really means a lot to me." you say to her as the two of you continues walking towards her private chambers so she can get you prepared.
1412212111111111112111.title: Yes

14122121111111111121111.content:
On their way there, you have many questions for Kina but there's one that seems to really be in your head, not wanting to get out. "I've got a question Kina, why have you decided to let me live?" you ask.

Kina just giggles at that. "Becausssssse human, you have proven yoursssssself to be a worthy addition to my kingdom." she answers and while you think it's because you were able to kill that giant pig and bring it back for her to eat, her real reasoning is because with you, her kingdom will be able to continue when the time comes for her to pass on.

As you continue on your way, you continue to be oblivious to the changes that are happening to you as a blue tail begins emerging from your backside, just above your bubbleshaped butt and it's getting longer and longer.

This change didn't go unnoticed by Kina who happened to catch a glimpse of it as the two of you passed by a mirror. 'She's certainly turning out lovely.' she thinks to herself.

Something else you catch on the way there is that there seem to be what look like partial humans, almost like they're a hybrid between being human and one of these anthro cobras. 'Just what is going on here?' you think to yourself, unaware you're undergoing the same fate.

And then finally you arrive at Kina's private chambers. "Ssssssssssso ssssssshall we get you ready for the day?" she asks.
14122121111111111121111.title: Arrival

141221211111111111211111.content:
You look around and marvel at just how elegantly decorated her private chambers are, even moreso than the ones you had been staying in and you just can't believe that such a place actually exists. "Yes Kina, I'm ready." you reply.

Kina smiles as she snaps her clawed fingers as a pair of female naga assistants make their way to her side. "Please get our guest ready for the activities of the day." she requests of them.

The two assistants nod their heads while Kina leaves to take care of some other business. They stare at you almost as if they were sizing you up. 'Ssssssso that'ssssss the one that Kina wantssssss assssss her princessssss. I perssssssonally wouldn't have made the sssssame choice but it wasssssn't mine to make." one whispers to the other.

Eventually though, they break off their private conversation and focus their attention on you. "Well then we are going on help you get prepared for the day. Pleassssse follow ussss." one of them says as she waves you over to follow her.

As you follow behind them, you feel a strange tingling in your hands. What you don't realize is that they're growing smaller while your fingernails are turning a pitch black as they begin extending past the tips of your fingers.

What is the first thing they decide to do to get you ready for the day.
141221211111111111211111.title: Yes

choices: Frilly pink dress, complete with opera gloves
1412212111111111112111111.content:
The assistants lead you to a giagantic walk-in wardrobe. You are taken aback at the splendour of it all. Gold, silver and precious stones adorn many of the outfits and glisten with brilliance. A few colours seem off at times, but as your eyes reshape ant become slits, you realize that everything is in perfect order.

At first you are confused at the lack of male clothing, but you assume that it must be in the back somewhere. As you continue walking however, you start to mull it over in your head. "Well of course there's no male clothing. We-they're all females here!" You think to yourself.

As such, you are only mildly surprised when the assistants offer you a
1412212111111111112111111.title: Get You Dressed

142.content:
The two guards grab your arms and drag you out of the throne room. Where ever they're taking you, you hope it's not to be executed. They bring you to an underground chamber. In it are hundreds of other humans, male and female. They all sit around a single fire in the center of the cave, huddled together.

The guards toss you into the room and shut the heavy stone door behind you. Everyone else in the room is staring at you. Then one of them beckons you to come over. You sit next to him and you begin talking.

"What's your name?" He asks. "Jake." You reply. "Mark." He says. You tell each other how you got here. Turns out your stories are pretty similar. Mark was on a fishing trip with his family and he fell overboard, and ended up here. "So what happens now?" You ask.

"Now, we wait. We are kept in here until we can be used." He replies solemnly. "Used for what?" You ask. "Anything they can think of. We are used for slaves, food, even pets."

"Wait, did you say food?" You ask nervously. "Yes. If anyone tries to escape, if one of them feels hungry, or if they are low on food, then we are eaten."

Now you really wish you had just stayed at home. "But some of us get lucky." Says Mark. "Citizens sometimes come in here and adopt us as pets. Then you get out of this pit and live with them."

"So my best hope is to become someone's pet, or i spend the rest of my life as a slave, and possibly food?" You ask. "Welcome to the club." Says Mark.

You can't believe this! A few hours ago you were relaxing on a cruise ship! Now your a slave! Or worse! Just then, the stone door slides open and the same skunk amazon steps in, spear held in front of her.
142.title: "Put him with the otherssssssss."

1422.content: The skunk has you all line up. Then she takes you a room that has anthros waiting there. Some are dogs, some are birds, some are cats , some are dragons, there are even some dinosaurs. One of them, a black bird takes Mark. Then a ___________ comes up to to adopt you. What is it?
1422.title: "Line up! Adoption!

14221.content: A sapphire dragon comes up to you. She looks like saphira from the movie 'ERAGON', she is about ten feet tall, with wings on her back. " I'll take you home with me, you will like living with me little one." She grabs your hand and you two go to where she lives. "You are cute for a human, if you want you can be my mate, or be my pet, which will it be? You think for a while. Finally you choose.........
14221.title: A sapphire dragon?

14222.content:
A tall raptor anthro walks up to you she has a slight beer belly that bounces as she walks.

"Oh this one should keep my other one company!" she smiles as she snatches you. She hands the warden some coins and she checks you off a list.

"I'm Tyla!" the Raptor introduces. She points to her bulging belly. "And this is Sydney. You're gonna love her!"

Tyla then rips off your clothes with a skillful swipe of her foot. And pounces on you. She's easily 3x your weight so you go down easily.
With you pinned Tyla leans close and..:
14222.title: A raptor?

14223.content:
You sat huddled into a corner. The only person you knew on this island of freaks had just been taken by some black bird to an unknown fate and now you were left here all alone. You sat near the back, although there weren't that may left, you could just imagine how you looked, scared and now more or less alone. A few anthros walked right past you not even noticing you till one walked in. She was a bald eagle, taller than most anthros, you'd say about 12 feet to the average 10, she looked like a bald eagle, white feathers covered her head and a yellow beak, her body, arms and legs were covered in brown feathers and both her arms and legs ended in yellow 4-fingered hands and feet that ended in black razor sharp claws. She was quite muscular and she carried herself with an air that more or less said "don't fuck with me" discouraging you from staring at her for too long. As soon as you broke eye contact however she walked right up to you, ignoring every other prisoner.

"Hey what's this one's story?" she yells at the guard.

"Newest prisoner, you want him, 20 coins" the guard replies.

She turns and stares at you, her eyes piercing straight into you "if he's new he hasn't been trained, 15" she replies.

The guard sighs but gives up motioning for the eagle and her to walk out, she comes back in a minute holding what looked like a dog collar, although big enough for you, the black bird that took Matt got one as well before she led him out. She unceremoniously dropped it over your head but surprisingly waited for you to stand up and follow her. "Looks like she doesn't want to eat me" you think semi-happily as she leads you out of the dungeon and away from the palace, heading towards the village that you passed through when you first arrived. After a few minutes of walking she stopped, looked around and pulled the leather "chain" short, so short that you had no choice but to follow right beside her. She seemed pleased with herself as she continued walking along.

A few seconds later you got another shock as she started to gently stroke your cheek with one clawed finer, that wasn't the shock however as after a few seconds you found yourself gently leaning against her moving yourself so she had an easier time stroking you. She really seemed pleased with this as she gave off what you could only describe as a cooing sound, reaching down she gently started stroking your cheek with her entire palm the scales on her hand feeling quite smooth and surprisingly soft, almost like skin as she stroked you.

"I'm not going to hurt you" she says, the shock of her talking knocking you out of the small reverie you had fallen into. "Although I'm very glad you like me, as I like you" she says giving off that same soft cooing sound before going back to stroking you with her palm as the two of you walked.

"Getting a bit soft are we Miranda?" A voice says, Miranda wheeling around pulling you close to her chest as she does so.

"What do you want Lira?" she replies, you gently move one of her arms out of the way and you get your first look at the other figure, she was an eagle like Miranda although much smaller, only about 8 feet tall as compared to Miranda's 12 and her body was covered in black feathers rather than brown.

"From how you were acting it almost looked like you cared for that male" she replied in a quite condescending tone

"Males serve only one purpose, to do whatever we say, they are slaves, entertainment, breeding stock nothing more, and it seems the male you have with you hasn't been taught that yet" she says.

As Lira talked you could feel every hair on your body stand up, and you found yourself trying to bury/hide yourself in Miranda's feathers.

Miranda just glared at her, one hand moving to gently stroke your back, "come now Miranda you know that the best males are those that have been "taught" give him to me and I promise he'll never even think of disobeying you" Lira continues her eyes for some reason piercing you with what you could feel as a hate filled stare.

"Fuck off Lira, and if I hear that you have even thought of touching him I will kill you" Miranda says before lifting you up into a bridal carry and jogging off towards the village. She doesn't stop till she reaches a hut and sets you down gently on the dirt floor. You tried to stand up but your legs collapsed out from under you, that was how scared you were.

Miranda lifted you up into a hug one hand gently stroking your back, "it's alright, I promise I will not let her hurt you, you are mine, and I will protect you" she says. "you again found yourself buried in her feathers, returning the hug as best you could, after a minute she let you go.

"I still haven't asked, what's your name?"

"Jake"

"Well Jake welcome home, I know it's not the nicest place, certainly not as nice as the palace, but better than a dungeon right?" you nod trying to seem enthusiastic but it was kind of hard as you were still a slave.

"What are you going to do with me?"

"What do you mean?"

"I'm your slave aren't I?"

"No, as I said you are mine, but you do not belong to me.....how do I put this? You are the watcher of my home, father of m children, you are my mate." You just sat there staring at her a bit stunned.

"Pardon?" was all you could choke out after a minute of silence.

Miranda sighed "What Miranda said was somewhat true, many anthros believe that men are only good for, well serving us, as long as they fulfill our needs they are useful, and for times....when there is no food. But I don't believe this I believe that men can be our equals, my father was wonderful, kind, sweet, he died protecting me as a child, men aren't something to just be used and thrown away" Miranda started to tear up a little as she mentioned her father and you let her continue.

"I went to look for a man who was free of our influence one that hadn't been "taught" to fear us....one I could love, and would love me, and I found you" she finishes her eyes falling on yours. Needless to say you were stunned, every anthro you had seen here had more or less told you that you were good for nothing more than food or pleasure, but this eagle was the complete opposite.

"Of course I still have to mark you with my scent, so the entire island knows you are mine, so I am asking if you would join me willingly rather than me having to force you, it would be much better for both of us that way"

"So, you'll just like rub up against me?"

Miranda giggled, "of course not, I can only mark you with my sweat, besides how else are you to become the 'father of my children'"

With a yelp you were lifted up, Miranda again carrying you like a new bride into what had to be her bedroom, a quite soft looking bed of what seemed to be molted feathers and leaves taking up the majority of the room. Miranda lowered you onto the bed before walking a few steps away, turning and then running up and pouncing on you. You felt her cheek gently cuddle against your, her arms wrapping around you possessively before moving away slightly her eyes meeting yours for a second before she leaned in, opening her beak slightly and kissed you.
14223.title: Or a bird '' eagle''

choices: Build some traps to take care of those hunters.
143.content:
The guards bring you a leather tunic, pants, and shoes. You put them on, eager to get out of your dirty, wet clothes. They hand you a sack full of fruit, and a small knife. "Thank you." You say, glad to be in clean clothes and for the food. "But, what is the knife for?" You ask, wondering as to why they would give you one.

"You will need it for your sssssssurvival." Hisses the empress. "What? Survival?" You say, puzzled. "Yessssss. Every outsider that comesssss to thissssss island must earn the right to sssssstay here." She explains. "You will be sssssent into the jungle for three dayssssss. A team of huntersssss will be sssssent after you. If you avoid them and sssssurvive for three daysssss, then you will be allowed to sssssstay here."

"And if I don't?" You ask, dreading the answer "Then you will either be killed, or brought back here to be my dinner." You gulp. "Take him to the edge of the jungle, and give him an hour head sssssstart." She commandes her guards.

As the guards escort you towards the exit, she says. "Oh, and watch out, there is more to fear in the jungle than jusssst my huntersssss." They bring you to the edge of the city. The jungle lays before you, thick and forbidding. The two anthro amazons just stand there, spears held out in front of them, waiting for you to go.

"You have until sundown." Says one of them, a wolfess. "At that time, you will be hunted. Find a place to hide. Fast." You quickly take her advice, running into the jungle, sack over your shoulder, knife at you side.

"Well, this is a fine mess I've gotten into." You say to yourself, praying you make it out of this alive. When no longer can see the city, you take a look at your surroundings. The treetops cover the sky, so you can't see the sun. You have no idea how long it will be until the hunters come for you.

But, you're human! Surely you can outsmart a bunch of animals! Even if they are somewhat human themselves. From the looks of it you have two options.

You could try to find shelter, maybe in a cave or up a tree. Or, you could use your brain against them, and start making some traps, that should even the odds a bit. So, what'll it be?
143.title: Salvation! or......not.

1431.content:
You take a look at your surroundings and see two possible hiding places. There is a cave about fifty yards away, with two statues of a wolf and fox amazon at either side of the entrance. That would be a good place to hide.

Or, you see an abandoned looking hut to the east. That could be another good place to hide.

So, what shall it be? The cave or the hut?
1431.title: Find some shelter, fast!

14311.content:
You make your way to the cave, pausing to look at the statues at the entrance. One is a wolf, the other is a fox. They are both kneeling on one knee, heads bowed, and spears held out in front of them. Your guess is that this is a sacred place to the amazons, and they would probably think you wouldn't dare hide in here.

You look in to the cave and see the wall is lined with torches, illuminating the entrance.
