"Who's to say that's not how your mother felt about keeping her relationship from you?"

"Who's side are you on?"

Betothed" she says.

"Why me, i'm nothing special" you say as there were about 10 different males within your vision range with hands on swords that did not look fake.

"Your exotic, your interesting, and most importantly you have so far been totally open with me" she says. You froze as you saw those same 10 furs jump up and start running to the front of the table where Zig Zag sat. Much to your suprise her hand closed around you and pressed to her body, "Stop" Zig Zag says anger evident in her voice. The furs freeze and she uncurls her hand and looks down at you then at them, "if you dare attack him I will see that as an attack on myself and you remember what happened the last time someone did that" Zig Zag says. You look up at her and were actually scared but she lowers her head, "don't worry I didn't hurt anybody, just used my....natural defenses" she says. You thought about it and that was better then what you were thinking of but you still shuddered a bit. The furs sat back down and the meal began, you were served what seemed to be duck, except it was a duck the size of a truck. You were all served water although Zig''s was served from a giant crystal pitcher, the meal thankfully was uneventful except for what happened at the start.

"Thank you everyone, I think I will retire" Zig Zag says standing up. Much to your suprise she picked you up and so you sat obediently as she walked through the halls. She entered a giant chamber which you figured out was Zig Zag's bedroom as there was a black and white striped bed sheet on a bed that was the size of a small suburb. She flops out on the bed and puts you down, "well little one, that went better then I expected" she says. You nod and look up at her as she was actually looking nervous, "there is um...one thing I must do before you are officially my betrothed" she says.

"I have to....spray you" she says.

You freeze, "excuse me" she says.

"This one is slightly different then the normal spray we give off as it contains some good pheremones that identify the target as owning to a skunk, they will never wash off and well due to our sense of smell, they're the only part we smell" she says.

"I knew it, you hate me now don't you?" Zig Zag says taking your moment of silence as a yes she was now on the verge of tears.

"Yes, but I, I never stopped loving you, and now, now you've marked this outsider I cannot stand for it" he says unsheathing his sword (yeah yeah laugh it up). She then lowers herself and kisses him "I knew you were still in love with our majesty, heck I had a crush on her for a tiny bit" she says which confused you until you remembered Zig attracted both guys and girls, guess that wasn't a lie. The two just stare at each other and Allison lowers herself to her knees after getting off Anthony "i'm sorry Zig Zag, please forgive us" she says.

Zig waves her hand "there was no harm done, but you better be a good advisor from now on Anthony" Zig Zag says adding an authoritative tone. He nods and carefully picks his sword up and puts it back in it's scabbard before he and Allison climb down the bed and walk out the door. 1553322222212112.content:
Zig Zag carries you through the halls of the palace with a spring in her step. “Where are we going?” You ask. “Well, you said you wanted kids, and there’s no time like the present.” She says as she comes to her bedroom door. Wow, you thought, she sure doesn’t waste any time. She sets you down on the bed and slowly begins to remove her dress. You sat there mesmerized as she ever so slowly revealed more of her body, a mischievous smirk on her face. “I thought you said you didn’t act like this.” A wide grin appears on her face as she finally finishes stripping, standing bare in front of you, hands on her hips. “Doesn’t mean I don’t know how. Besides, this is a special occasion, and I think this calls for it anyway.”


But as she lays down on the bed and places you on her breast, her confidence suddenly disappears. “What’s wrong?” You ask. “I…I’ve never done this before. I’m a little afraid I won’t be good enough for you.” You walk over to her face and stroke her muzzle, trying to comfort her. “You’ll do fine.” You say reassuringly. “I’m what, three hundred times smaller than you? I’m the one who should be worried about not being good enough.” That seemed to make Zig Zag feel better, as she smiled warmly and asked. “So are you going to remove those are shall I do it for you?”, indicating your clothes. Before you could answer, she holds you in her palm and removes your clothes with amazing dexterity with her fingers. She holds you in front of her face. “Ready?” She asks with a smirk. “Not exactly.” You say. Zig Zag smiles. “Don’t worry, I’ll be gentle.”


A few hours later, you were sprawled across Zig Zag’s stomach, sweating and panting. Her belly slowly rose and fell beneath you as she panted with you. “That…was….incredible.” She said between intakes of breath. “Yeah….you….too.” You reply. When you regain enough strength, you crawl up her stomach to her breasts. From your point of view, each was as big as a hill. You scale her right breast, Zig Zag clearly enjoying it as much as you did. When you reach the top, you lay there enjoying the softness of her breast as she strokes your back with one finger.


“Do you think it worked?” Zig Zag asked. “I hope so.” You say. “Because if it didn’t, I’m gonna need a good long while before we can try again. At least a month or so.” Zig Zag laughs at that remark. “Well, all we can do is wait and see.” She leans her head forward and kisses you before laying her head back on the pillows. You both fall asleep soon after that.


About two weeks later you both got your answer. Zig Zag’s belly had noticeably started to bulge. News of her pregnancy quickly spread across the island. Most of the citizens were excited and came to the palace themselves to give their congratulations. Others however, were less than pleased, particularly the many males who had wanted Zig Zag for themselves.


Even Anthony was noticeably disheartened on learning of Zig Zag’s coming birth, but he didn’t seem to hold any ill will towards you. But something unusual was going on with Zig Zag. By the second week of her pregnancy, her belly was twice the size it was before, and she showed none of the symptoms of pregnancy such as morning sickness or mood-swings. You guessed that Anthronian pregnancies worked differently than human ones.


One night during Zig Zag’s fifth week, you both lay in bed together, Zig Zag on her back and you on her stomach. By now, her belly had grown to stick out a good distance from her body. Had she been normal sized, it would look as though she had swallowed a beach ball. You gently rubbed her taut stomach as she murred and cooed softly. “Any ideas for a name for the little one?” You ask. “There’s still some time before she’s born, a name can wait.” Zig Zag said. “How do you know it’s a she?” You ask. Zig Zag giggles. “I just know.” She looks up at you. “Why? Do you think it will be a boy?” You shrug. “Boy, girl, it doesn’t matter to me. I’ll love it all the same.”

Zig Zag smiled gently stroked you. “That’s why I knew you would be a wonderful father.” You chuckle. “You seem to just know a lot of things, don’t you?” Zig Zag laughed. “I’m the queen, it’s my job to know everything.” Just then, you feel a kick directly beneath you, causing you to jump slightly. “Looks like she’s trying to tell you something.” Zig Zag said, smiling. You gently pat Zig Zag’s stomach. “Daddy’s here.” You say. “I hear you.”


You lay on your back, hands behind your head, and sigh. “What is it?” asks Zig Zag, sounding concerned. “It’s funny.” You say. “I have three younger brothers at home. After seeing what my parents went through with raising them, I swore I would never have kids. I also swore to never get married after my parents got divorced and my dad was left with nothing to his name.”


“What’s a divorce?” Asks Zig Zag. “That’s where two people who are married can’t stand each other anymore and separate for good. Typically it involves the woman getting everything the man owns in the process. I used to think marriage was a trap created by women to rob men of their homes and money. Yet here I am, married to you and expecting a child.”


Zig Zag nods. “So why did you marry me?” You shrug. “I guess I could just see there was something about you that was different from a human female. You’re honest, kind, caring. Those qualities are nearly impossible to find in people.” Zig Zag places you in her palm and nuzzles her against her cheek. “You humans can’t all be that bad. Just look at you.” You kiss her cheek. “Thanks Zig Zag.”


The big day finally arrived. You stood outside the doors to Zig Zag’s bedroom, listening to the commotion from inside. You could hear Zig Zag, grunting and panting, but hardly screaming at all. You heard voices telling her she was nearly there, and to keep pushing. You had offered to be there with her to hold her hand, but then you realized that would likely crush you.


For what seemed an eternity, you stood outside the room, anxious and nervous at the same time. Finally, you hear the sound of a baby crying. After several more minutes, the door opens and one of the doctors, Allison, steps out, a huge smile on her face. “It’s done!” She says excitedly. She leads you inside to a ladder leaning against Zig Zag’s bed for you to climb. You quickly scale the ladder to the top of the bed, to see Zig Zag, smiling broadly, and bundle in her arms.


“What did I tell you?” She says. “It’s a girl!” She picks you up between her fingers and places you on her shoulder. She opened the pink bundle to reveal your newborn daughter. She was the spitting image of her mother, right down to the black and white stripped fur, white hair, and fluffy tail, albeit in miniature form.


Or at least, miniature to Zig Zag. To you, the baby was three times your size already. You really weren’t looking forward to her teenage years. “So, have you decided on a name?” You ask Zig Zag, who nods. “Yes. I have decided to name her Zelda, after my sister.”


“You have a sister?” You inquire, as she had never mentioned this before. “I did. It’s a long story. Now’s really not the time for it.” You look down at your daughter as she sucks her thumb in her sleep. Well, here I am, you think, right where I said I never would be. I just hope I turn out to be a better parent than mine were.

You sighed and looked up at her "yes Kasmir" you reply. "So how was your nap?" she inquires lowering her face closer to you, "Oh it was excellent" you reply seeing no reason tell anything but the truth, "best sleep I've had in a long time, you take very good care of yourself, your fur is very soft and comfortable." Although you couldn't see it Kasmir blushed at the compliment, although most of her servants did compliment her on things such as her appearance, this was the first time she had ever heard one that seemed so heartfelt. Kasmir slowly stood up the grin that had been on her face before seeming to grow, if that was possible. Without warning she just started walking taking you along for the ride, "um...Kasmir, do you mind telling me where you're going?" you ask.

"I thought we could go for a walk before dinner, I thought you might be interested in a personal guided tour of my home" she says. You hesitate a second before answering "That sounds great" and with that she opened the door and the tour began. "Legend states that hundreds of years ago, the Panthenon, our gods and goddesses, carved this castle out of a mountain so that the leader of the Anthronians, my ancestor may have a home that actually fit her, it took them only a week to create this whole castle. Each generation of ruler has added their own touches to the castle, my mother for example hand carved each of the statues you see lining the halls, and I added a garden to the center of the castle" she finishes seeming quite proud of herself. You couldn't help but grin to yourself, the tour continued for a good hour, Kasmir pointing out things such as tapestries, furniture, and even whole rooms that her predecessors had built or added to the castle. Finally she ended the tour with the dining hall, to say it was massive was an understatement, the dining hall seeming to be fashioned after the ones of Midieval Europe with a ceiling about 3 times as tall as Kasmir and the room being large enough that it took her a minute to walk from one end to the other. The dining hall was furnished with a single table, although you were sure it was made up of more than one piece each piece fit so perfectly it looked like one long table that took up the center of the room.

Kasmir walked to the head of the table, sitting in a high backed chair obviously meant for her as the "chairs" if you could call them that looked more like small watch towers with a ladder on the back for the person to climb their way up. Kasmir set you down on the table and was just about to say something when a loud, low horn blast cut her off. "Oh, it seems we're right in time for supper. You weren't sure where they all came from but within minutes hundreds upon hundreds of anthros came streaming into the room, each anthro taking a place in a chair. You couldn't have counted more than 500 altogether, but something seemed amiss but you couldn't quite put your finger on it, you shrug it off for the moment instead focusing on the food being brought in by groups of anthros and then lifted onto the table by Kasmir. There were many strange creatures, a boar with a fin like a sailfish, what looked like some sort of rainbow coloured trout as well as a rabbit, although it had golden fur and was as large as you were. The drink was some sort of fruity drink made from what at least tasted like mangoes and peaches.

After the meal had concluded one of the anthros, a fox woman approach Kasmir, "your majesty?' she says Kasmir shooting her a look for a second causing her to back up for a second before clearing her throat "I mean Empress Kasmir." Kasmir sighs and lowers her head to look at the fox "yes Jaina what is it?" she asks. "Um...it's about the crops, the drought is still going on, we are in danger of losing the majority of this year's harvest" Jaina says. Kasmir sighs like this had happened before "do we have enough in the stores to make up for it?" The fox woman nods and looks at a sheet of bark she was holding "yes, but if we do that, well there will be no stores left" she replies. Kasmir sighs and sits back in her chair, "Um...Kasmir?" you say.

"Yes" she replies her eyes focusing more on the ceiling than you. "Couldn't you just irrigate the crops to make up for the lack of water?" you say. Kasmir bolts up, "irri-what?" she says her gaze focusing on you. "Irrigation, it's a system of pipes or ditches that takes water from a source like a river and diverts it crops so they can use it" you say. "But, how would that get the water to the leaves" Kasmir replies. "Why would it need to get to the leaves?" you ask. "Plants take in water through their leaves" she replies matter-of-factly. You literally facepalm "Kasmir that is, that is false" you reply. For the next 20 minutes you explained to Kasmir and who you learned was the head of food for the island how plants took in water the finer points of irrigation. Jaina ordering another anthro to bring more of the bark sheets and what looked like a stick of graphite wrapped in a leaf. By the time you had finished explaining she had used up all the bark sheets she had and was staring at you like you had just told her some mystic truth.

Before you could stop her Jaina tackled you onto the table wrapping you up in a full body hug "oh thank you, thank you, thank you, this is perfect, oh wait I must go and get this started" she bolts up grabbing the notes she had written and ran off. You heard Kasmir chuckle for a second before you were knocked off your feet as she moved her palm underneath you and you were lifted up. "See, I told you that we could help each other" she says. Before you could say anything she moved forward and kissed you gently pressing you against her own palm. "K-kasmir" you say staring up at her in shock, you had never been expecting something like this. Kasmir for her part just smiled for a second before getting up and starting to walk. The two of you were silent as she walked, although you grew curious as she neared the throne room. She sat down in her throne placing you down on her armrest "Marie" she calls, a cat fur running to stand in front of her. "I need.......
1553322222222222211.title: After the nap

15533222222222222111.content:
"I need the 3 marriage trials prepared" Kasmir states the cat fur looking quite surprised. "You've finally made your choice then Empress Kasmir?" Marie replies, Kasmir nods in reply smiling slightly which you didn't really notice. Marie pauses before running off and looks up at Kasmir "would you like them to be held over the next 3 days?" Marie asks. Kasmir nodded again and Marie ran off to fulfill her given order. You turned towards Kasmir, curiosity taking over, "so what are these marriage trials you're talking about?" you ask. Kasmir just smiled slightly for a second before replying "unlike most of my people, as Empress I get to decide my mate, the trials are to prove that the male I have chosen is worthy of being emperor" she replies.

"Well this'll be quite interesting" you reply sitting back on the armrest, "I get to see a very important part of your culture, so who's the lucky guy?" you ask. Kasmir looked dumbstruck as you asked the question "the one I have chosen is you, you didn't realize?" she says her head tilted to the side in a confused expression. "Oh well that's nice....wait me, why would you want me?" you ask this making absolutely no sense to you. Kasmir waited long enough to lower her head to be level with you before answering you, "did you see anything strange at dinner?" she asks. "Well now that you mention it, I did feel like there was something....off" you reply. Kasmir nods slowly before giving off a small sigh "my kingdom at the moment has a population of five hundred anthros, of those only twenty-five are male" she says pausing to let what she said sink in.

You just stood there for a second stunned at what you were hearing "only 1/20th the population is male?" you say stifling the urge to shout. Kasmir nodded slowly before outright sighing this time and laying her head down on the armrest "yes, my people have always been plagued by a low male birthrate, so "laying claim" to a male as fast as possible is very important, although as Queen I get to decide who I choose, and I choose you" she says her expression growing more cheerful as she spoke. "I'm sorry if this is insulting Kasmir, but...why me?" you ask. She smiles for a second, her fingers closing on the back of your shirt and she moved you closer to her face "well for starters you're quite a smart man, you haven't even been here a day and you already solved a quite detrimental problem for my people. On top of that, you are quite....trusting as you instantly listened to my request, and yet you're willing to speak your mind around me" Kasmir paused to set you down on the armrest before continuing.

"As for the trials themselves, they are split into three: body, mind, and heart, you will also face each trial in that order" she says. You nod slowly and she sops and seems to consider something before speaking again. "The first two trials were created by me, back on my 18th birthday, they will of course have to do with me, although I may inform you right now that nothing such as facing me in combat will be required" this information bringing a large sigh of relief from you. "However I can only tell you one more things surrounding the trials. You may get clues for the trial, but they along with the instructions will only be issued on the day of the trial." You just sat there as Kasmir finished speaking trying to take in all that you had learned. The trials had something to do with Kasmir, and thankfully it seemed like you would only need to do one per day. "What exactly happens if I fail one of the trials?" you ask.

Kasmir looks at you quite sadly "nothing will happen, although it'll make me very sad" she says her voice dropping a few decibels. You walk forward and before you could stop yourself, you started stroking her cheek fur, suprisingly you felt Kasmir's head tilt in your direction so that you could stroke more of her cheek. After a minute of this Kasmir sat up "I think it's about time we went to bed" she says, before you were lifted and deposited into her palm. You looked out one of the windows Kasmir passed and you noticed that it was indeed later in the evening, the sun just peeking out behind a set of mountains in the distance, and painting the sky orange, and red.

Kasmir reached her chamber in a moment and you were gently deposited on the bed before you heard her walk off. You weren't sure why but you looked up, Kasmir was standing near a dresser that stood against the wall, and as if she forgot you were there entirely she started undressing. You quickly turned away, holding you eyes down at the bed you heard the sound of cloth hitting the floor once, then twice and a drawer open then close. What surprised you was that you didn't hear anything after that except for Kasmir's footsteps for a few seconds before her fingers wrapped around you and you were lifted up. You felt Kasmir walk to the front of the bed, and then her body reclined as she lay down her hand gently depositing you on her stomach. "You wouldn't mind doing what you did before, would you?" Kasmir asked.

"You mean pet-ting-you...." you trailed off as you looked up to answer Kasmir, your voice failing you as not only did you see Kasmir's face but 2 very well-sized hills sitting between you and her. You quickly looked back down at her stomach and you felt her finger gently poke you a second later "what's wrong? You looked up at me and then you..." she trailed off as she seemed to realize what had caused you to falter. You felt Kasmir's finger gently wrap around you and you were lifted up and deposited quite quickly, "open your eyes" she says. You weren't sure why but you had the feeling you shouldn't so you shook your head. "Open your eyes" she says again this time adding a bit more of an authoritative tone to her voice. You slowly opened your eyes, a wall of white fur rising to a peak meeting your gaze. You felt your cheeks flush instantly freezing when you heard Kasmir speak "well, be honest, how do I look?" she asks.

"P-pardon?" you reply having to fight to even speak you felt so embarassed. Kasmir gave off a small almost exasperated sigh "I want to know what you think of me, I mean I would understand if you find me ugly" she says. You quickly turned to face her "that's not true...you're..." you start but your not sure how to continue. "I'm what?" she asks curiosity practically dripping from the question. "Well...you're the most beautiful creature I've ever seen, but more so than that you're kind, and gentle, beautiful in both mind and body" you say. This time you did see her fur visibly redden, "thank you" she whispers, you were lifted up off her body before being lifted up to her face as she sat up, a deep purr starting as she brought you up to eye level.

Kasmir leaned forward and gently kissed you again, and this time you kissed her back, "i'm sure you will pass all the trials with flying colours, now I think it's about time we got to sleep" she says. Suprising you instead of setting you back on her stomach she set you down on her collarbone and curled up around you her, her hands laying over you holding you in place. It was the most comfortable you had ever felt, you started to gently stroke her fur elicting a soft purr from Kasmir. The two of you fell asleep like this content just to be with each other, you safe and sound surrounded by her warm body, and her content that she had finally found her true love.
15533222222222222111.title: The three marriage trails prepared" (reserved)

Name: Fortune

Species: Snow leopard

Fortune is a snow leopard with long black hair that goes down to her waist. She wears a bright red dress that shows off her body, yet covers it as well. She is believed to be the incarnation of Mushana, the goddess of love, and is thus very vain. Her palace is full off mirrors for her to admire herself in, and she grants blessings to her subjects who bring her tributes, and curses on those who anger her. She also has a hypnotizing gaze that makes males do her every whim.
155332222222222222.title: A Little Seduction?

1553322222222222221.content:
On the throne in front of you sits the most enchanting thing you've ever seen. A giantess leopard with white fur, speckled with black spots. Her hair is as black as night, and cascades down her back to her waist. She is dressed sort of like Jessica Rabbit, a tight red dress that hugs her body, showing of her voluptuous figure.


She smirks as she beckons to you. "Come closer." Her voice was cool and seductive, like a temptress baiting her prey. You step forward, mesmerized by her beauty. A delightful aroma seems to be emanating from her, it smelled of roses and honey, having sort of a calming effect.


Normally, you would be terrified of such a gigantic creature, but her beauty, combined with her scent, caused quite the opposite. You calmly walked toward her, not scared in the least.


She reached down and picked you up between her thumb and index finger, lifted you up, and placed you on the armrest of her throne. "Now, my pet, would you mind telling me your name?" You didn't even mind that she called you "my pet".


"My name is Jacob." You say. "What is yours?" She laughed. It was no ordinary laugh, it almost sounded like a symphony of angels, a melodious, beautiful sound.


"I have many names." she says, smiling, showing her gleaming white teeth. "But you may call me Fortune. Miss Fortune." She said with emphasis on "Miss".


"Now that introductions are out of the way, what shall I do with you?" She says, putting a finger to her chin, thinking. "If it isn't too much, I would like to go home." you say. Fortune leans down with a seductive look on her face. "Why? What do you have at home that is so important? wouldn't you rather stay here with me? Forever?"


As she speaks, you stare into her emerald green eyes. Suddenly, you loose all reason and logic. There is only her beautiful face, and mesmerizing voice. You really do want to stay here.


"On second thought, there's nothing for me at home. I would like to stay here." You say in a dazed voice. "Splendid." Says Fortune. "Now, could you do something for me?" she asks. "Anything for you." You say, not even realizing what you are saying.


"Could you......."
1553322222222222221.title: Fortune the Snow Leopard

choices: She wants to take a bath with you.
She wants to share her bed with you.
15533222222222222211.content:
"Could you kiss me?" Fortune asks with a seductive smile. She leans forward, exposing her cleavage to you. You had to admit: she was hard to resist. However, you knew that you didn't want to kiss her. It wasn't that she wasn't pretty, you just didn't want to kiss a girl that you didn't truly love. Unfortunately, you haven't met that girl yet.

"Is something the matter?" Fortune asks. "Don't you want to kiss me?"

You hesitate and say no. Needless to say, she was surprised.

"Why not?" she asks.

"Well, I just don't like you like that."

She chuckles. "Very impressive," she says. "No man has been able to resist my charms."

"So you were tempting me."

"Yes I was." she says without shame. "That aside, I really should reward you for being able to resist the empress of Anthronia.

"What do you have in mind?"
15533222222222222211.title: The Temptress's Kiss

Name: Gen

Species: Giraffe

Gen is the gentle giant type. She would never harm a living thing, and always does what is best for her people. She is lonely, with only servants to keep her company, and seeks a companion to spend her time with. At this point, she's willing to take anyone, even someone human and 300 times smaller than her.
1553322222222222222.title: A Gentle Giant?

15533222222222222221.content:
(This chapter was originally written by my friend, Blader. All credit for this one goes to him.)

You gaped open-mouthed up at the creature that even sitting towered above you. The very fits thing you noticed was that they're empress had to be a giraffe as it looked like her legs were atleast half her height while her smaller head sat on a larger then normal neck. Being a giraffe she was very slim which also meant that she was pretty much flat, but yet that didn't seem to detract from her body as a whole. You wouldn't say she was petite but comparing her to everyone else she looked a bit....underfed to you either that or she wasn't eating enough. Long slim legs and arms extended to a smaller body covered completely in a deep sea blue dress that billowed down to her hooves. Thankfully her arms ended in normal hands although her whole body was covered in yellow hair/fur that was blotched brown in an even pattern. On her head sat a very simple tiara that was pretty much just a golden circlet. Her face didn't reveal much except that her eyes stared down at you happily, yet there was something behind the eyes.

"Who might you be?" the giraffe asks.

"A-Alex, ma'am" you say staring up at her. The giraffe slowly stands up and you gape, she was even taller then you thought, she had to stand at 400ft tall. The giraffe gently lowers herself to a kneeling position and holds out a hand, "come here, I won't hurt you" she says. For some reason you trust her and step onto her hand, she lifts you up to her face and smiles "I am Gen and I am the empress of the nation, where did you come from?" she asks.

You told her everything, you could she nodded at times and a look of concern crossed her face as you described how you drowned "well I'm quite happy to hear that you survived, welcome to my kingdom of Anthroia" she says still smiling. She stands up and moves sitting back down in her throne, you looked up at the gigantic giraffe and decided to ask what was on your mind "ummm...your majesty" you say.

"Please just call me Gen" she says smiling down at you.

"Alright, I know we just met but are you unwell?" you ask.

"No, why?" she asks.

"Well, you seem quite skinny, even for a giraffe" you say.

"I-I eat quite well thank you" she says, you raise a hand up and your able to trace the outline of one of her ribs in the dress.

"You don't look well fed to me" you say. Gen stares at you for a few seconds before starting to cry, "oh shit, oh shit, oh shit" you think to yourself. "Uh, it's alright, you still look very beautiful" you say.

Gen shakes her head and slowly stops crying "I know you didn't call me ugly, your right I haven't been eating well, I'm depressed and lonely and your the first one to say something about it" she says.

"Depressed?" you ask.

"Yes, I was born the only child of the royal family and was raised to be better then everyone else, I didn't have any friends growing up and now that I finally am the empress everyone subjects, servants or otherwise treats me as such. I don't want to be seen as just the empress, I want some one to play with when i'm bored or just snuggle with when it's cold, some one to notice and speak up when I've done something wrong or when there's something wrong with me without fear of consequences. I, I just want someone to love and love me back" she says bursting into tears again and burying her head into her hands. You were stunned to say the least and realize what you had seen in her eyes was pain, the pain of someone who had been mostly alone all their life.

"Gen" you say, she lifts her head and realizes you were still there, wiping away the tears she says "I am sorry, I'm not acting very empress-like, let me find you a place to stay" she says trying to smile again.

"Gen I know we just met, so I know this will sound kind of weird, but can't I just stay with you?" you ask.

"Pardon?" she replies.

"Well you said your lonely, and I've got no place to stay here, so can I stay with you?" you ask.

Gen stared down at you, she lifted her hand up to her face "really? You'd want to stay with me?" she asks.

"I mean if you don't want...." you were cut off as she hugged you. "Of course you can stay with me" she says happiness evident in her voice, "oh but you must be starved after all that you've been through" she says standing up. She holds you as she starts walking with a purpose, letting you get a second look at the absolutely gigantic palace, the halls were lined with giant carpets made out of insane lengths of wool. She enters a gigantic dining hall which you couldn't even estimate the size, all you know is that the ceiling was probably 3 times Gen's height. She sits down at one end of the huge dining table and lifts a bell about the size of a church bell with her free hand ringing it before putting you down on her shoulder.

Out of a bunch of side corridors run 3 different anthros all cats as they make it up to the top of the table in a matter of seconds. They all run up and kneel before Gen "yes your empress" the middle one which was covered entirely in black fur says without looking up.

"Yes, I'd like a nice salad brought here, as well as a nice sing fruit" she says. The 3 cats nod before running off to you assume fulfill her request. They come back in a few minutes with a bunch of other anthros, most were carrying a bowl of salad that Gen reached down and picked up lifting up to the table. One cat carried a fruit that looked like you took an orange and made it as long as a banana. Gen picked the fruit up after setting the salad down, she nodded at the servants "thank you, you are excused for now" she says.

They nodded and left although you were sure one of the wolves turned and stared in your general direction before walking away. You heard a tearing sound and you turn to see Gen skinning the fruit before setting the pink centre'd fruit down on the table. She lifts her hand up and you step on, she sets you down on the table and starts to eat the salad. You take that as a cue and dig into the fruit. The fruit tasted quite good, juicy yet tangy it was a very unique flavor, a taste you had definitely never tasted before but it was still excellent.

"How is it?" Gen asks.

"Quite good actually, how's the salad?" you ask.

"It's heavenly, it's been a while since I last ate a good salad" Gen says. You nod and dig back into the fruit, your able to eat about half the fruit and get yourself totally covered by the fruit's juices. Gen looks down at you and giggles "can I have the rest of that?" she asks pointing to the fruit.

"Sure go ahead" you say, she picks up the other half of the fruit and tosses it into her mouth "mmm nothing better then a juicy sing fruit" she says. Smiling she lifts you up "aww your all covered in the juice, well let me fix that" Gen says. She lifts you up and starts licking you "mmm sing fruit juice" she says licking you faster and faster, in a minute you were totally soaked in her saliva. You glared up at the giraffe and she giggles "sorry, I go a bit overboard around sing fruit" she says.

"It's alright" you say wiping saliva off yourself before you shiver.

"Oh no, are you cold?" she asks.

"Nah I'm fine" you say before shivering again.

"Don't worry I'll warm you up so....
15533222222222222221.title: Gen the Giraffe

Name: Lenore

Species: Dragon

Lenore is a black dragon with a red chest and belly. She has two massive, bat-like wings on her back, which are also black. Two large horns protrude from the top of her skull, and curl to the side, like a ram. She has a somewhat dark personality, and tends to be on the moody side. It turns out being empress isn't all it's cracked up to be, and she has grown bored of her position as ruler. She wants to have a regular life and pass on her throne to someone else, but being a giant dragon can cause difficulties outside the palace. She wears two gold bracelets on her wrists, a golden necklace on her neck, and a dark blue skirt that goes down to her knees.
15533222222222222222.title: Nevermore?

choices: Offer to help set up an election for a new ruler
155332222222222222221.content:
Before you sits a gigantic anthro dragoness. Her scales are a black as a raven, except her belly and chest, which are a deep scarlet. Two huge, bat-like wings protrude from her back. They are currently folded, so you can't tell how wide they are. Her eyes are a deep purple color, with slitted pupils, like a cat.


Two horns curl from the top of her skull to the sides of her head, almost making her look like a giant, scaly, winged mountain goat. She stares at you with a bored expression, head propped up in one hand. She drums the fingers of her other hand on the armrest of her throne.


"Come closer." She says with a dull tone, as though she's been through this a thousand times before. You step toward her, rather intimidated by her size. "My name is Lenore, who are you?" She says as though she were half asleep. "Alex." You reply. "Are you a human?" She asks. You nod.


"I thought so. You'd be surprised how many of you kind have washed up on my shores. All together, I think it's like 50." You stare up at her, wondering why she sounds so bored.


"Excuse me." You say. "I don't mean to be rude, but you sound like you're not even interested in me being here." She scoffs. "Didn't you hear what I just said? I've seen plenty of your kind, it's no big news. We even have a little district of the city cut off for them, so they don't end up getting stepped on."


She sighs. "I'm sorry, I've just been stuck in this dead end job for so long. You have no idea what it is like to rule a nation. People always begging you for advice, having to solve other people's problems, constantly having to make decisions, and that's just for starters!"


"So, you don't want to be queen?" You ask. "You got it." She says. "I would give all this up in an instant, just to have a normal life, to be a regular citizen."


"Well, what if I could help you?" You say. She stifles a laugh. "You? How could you possibly be any help to me?"
155332222222222222221.title: Lenore the Dragon

choices: "For a hot bath. You must need one afterall."
1553322222222222222211.content:
"An election?" Says Lenore, as though she had never heard the word. "What's an election?" She asks, puzzled. "Well......" You explain. "It's simple. The citizens of your Island will vote on who they want as their new ruler. You select some candidates that you think would make a good ruler, and whoever gets the most votes from the people will be the new queen."


"Is this how your people's leaders are chosen where you come from?" Asks Lenore. "Yes." You say. "But where I come from, we elect several leaders, because we use a different system. But I'm not trying to start a revolution here." "You would do this for me?" Says Lenore. "Just so I can have some peace?" "Of course." You say. "On one condition."


"Name it." Says Lenore.


"I will do this election for you, if I get to stay here in the palace, as an honored guest." You say. "Done!" Says Lenore excitedly. "You may stay with me until the election is over. To be honest, I never wanted to be queen to begin with. Now I can live a normal life like everyone else!" She actually seems to be excited over this. It's an improvement over her bored, sarcastic attitude.


Then, she does something unexpected. She reaches down and picks you up between her finger, holds you up to her mouth, and kisses you. "I can't tell you how much this means to me." She says. "You must be hungry after what you've been through." She turns to her servants. "Bring some food."


The servants bow and run out of the room, returning a minute later, carrying a bottle, a plate of meat, and a bowl of fruit. They place the food in Lenore’s palm, and she places you on the armrest of her throne, placing the food in front of you.


The bottle held some sort of wine that smelled and tasted much like honey. The meat was good, but tasted unlike any you had before, like a cross between chicken and steak. The fruit was very strange, such as what looked like an orange, but was purple and tasted like watermelon.


When you finish eating, Lenore picked you up and placed you on her shoulder. “Where are we going?” You ask as she gets up from her throne.
1553322222222222222211.title: Offer to help set up an election for a new ruler

155332222222222222222.title: A Firey Pheonix?

choices: "I think we should go have something to eat"

1553322222222222222221.content:
You stared up, transfixed by the radiant figure sitting in the the large ornately carved throne. You could tell that you were looking at a phoenix, but she was beautiful, resplendent, her gold and red plumage seeming to shine with their own inner light, each feather appearing as if a small flame. She was wearing in contrast to her bright red plumage a soft looking light blue cocktail dress with a small slit in the center creating a v between her breasts. Two quite large yellow eyes stared down at you over a small orange beak that seemed to you to twist up into a smile, although you weren't entirely sure. You froze as she slowly stood up and took a single step, her foot, which you now noticed was shaped like a bird's, 3-toed and clawed, landing probably 20 feet in front of you. She bent over her, your attention fixed itself solely on her form so you were caught by enough suprise to give a little yelp when you were lifted up, 2 clawed fingers taking hold of the back of your shirt. She lifted you up to face level and examined you as you swung in the air, every so often giving off a small hmm, or hah. Finally she took a step back and sat down in the chair her examination finished she held you out at what for her was about arms length.

"Who and what are you?" she asks, her eyes never once leaving you.

"Me I-I'm Jake, and I'm a human" you stammer.

"What are you doing on my island?" she asks, although you noticed a change in her voice it sounded sweeter. Without a moment's hesitation you launched into the story of how you got washed up onto the island, how you stumbled into the trap, were captured and finally brought before her. As you did her eyes slowly seemed to soften until you swear it looked like she was going to cry. She lowered you onto the arm of her chair her head coming to rest on her arm so you were practically looking at her face to face, or well close enough. "I must apologize, for my earlier behaviour and my unnecesscary tone of voice. I did not know if you were a threat to my people or not" she says.

"It's ok" you reply quickly, "although your majesty if I might ask, may I make a request" you say.

"My name is Nepenthe, and I wish to be addressed as such, and yes you may" she replies.

"Since I seem to be no threat to your people, could I possibly go home?" you ask.

Nepenthe stares at you for a couple seconds before shaking her head "I'm sorry, but we can't let you leave, although you don't seem to be a threat to my people, I have heard things about the outside world and your people, so we can't risk you leaving as there is a chance you might lead them back here" she says. You slowly nod, although you would have liked to head home, you could see her reasoning as to why they'd want to keep you there. You had to look somewhat depressed as you felt her finger start to gently stroke across your back "don't worry, you can live here as a citizen of my kingdom" she says her voice soft and calm to soothe you.

You looked up at her large face "thank you, although I'm not entirely sure what I could do for you" you say.

Nepenthe takes a second to think "well I do need an advisor, do you think that you could do that?" she asks.

"I can try" you reply. She lifted her hand up and you were deposited onto her shoulder before snapping her fingers, the guards at the door rushed over to stand in front of her throne "yes your majesty" one says her head bowed.

"You may inform everyone that I am finished with the new arrival and that he is officially a citizen of our island as well as my advisor, also I am free to adress any complaints or grieviances anyone might have" she states. The guards both quickly bowed again and raced off to fufill their order, Nepenthe and you just waited for a few minutes, her fingers drumming on the arm of the throne as she seemed to be quite bored. The guards returned with a group of 6 amazons, 5 female and 1 male, although all seemed to be some variant of a wild cat. One guard stopped at the door while the other led the group to the front of Nephente's throne. "What is the problem?" Nephente asks leaning over although careful not to have you fall off.

"All 6 of these women claim to be the woman that this man loves, although he claims only one of these women is the one he loves and the others just sires" the guard states. You looked down at the group, all 6 were in some way or another clinging onto the guy, and you couldn't help but take a few seconds to wonder about this whole "sire" thing before Nephente speaks. "Which one of you is the one he loves?" she asks. In a second each yells "me" and then they literally growl at the rest of the group Nepenthe sighs and slumps back into her chair.

"Why don't you just ask the male, which of them he loves?" you whisper into her ear.

"I would, but we are a matriarchal society, I cannot make a decision based solely on a male's word" she replies.

"Oh, ouch" you think. "Do you mind if I give it a try?" you ask as you had heard a story like this before. She nods her head "if you can fix this, you are welcome to try" she replies.

You clear your throat and Nepenthe sits back up giving you a better vantage point "each of you claims to be the one this man loves?" you ask. Each female cat in turn nods their head, and you can't help but smile "very well then, there is only one solution, since each of you loves him we will divide him into 5 pieces and he will be shared equally among you" you state. Instantly the room goes silent except one girl a leopardess rushes forward practically throwing herself in front of the throne "please Empress not that, that would kill him, we...we can share him without that step if we must" she cries.

Nepenthe seems to have figured out your plan as you looked over to see a small smile on her beak, "that action will not be necesscary, it is obvious that you are the one who loves him the most and I assume from how much he is fidgeting back there, he loves you back" the leopardess just stared up at her. "Guards if you would please remove the others" the two guards removed the other felines from the male and he rushed over to the leopardess the two embracing each other. You got a lot of cold stares as the other felines stalked out fo the room, the leopardess and what you now realized was a lion stared up at you happily. "Thank you Empress, thank you" the leopardess says before the two of them are led out of the chamber.

Nepenthe lifts you up off her shoulder "that was a very wise thing to do" she says.

You shrug, "it wasn't that hard, besides I've read a story where something similar happened" you reply.

"I am still most impressed, to be honest I was completely stumped as to what should have been done" she says. She moves her other arm and puts you down in her palm, "Nepenthe may I ask a question?" you ask.

"You may" she replies.

"What did they mean with that sire thing?" you ask.

"There is a large imbalance in my kingdom between males and females, I cannot stop love from sprouting, but I cannot just let my citizens who wish to be mothers go their lives without children. So a male may have one love, be it of an inital claim which grew into love, or because it was more...sudden, any women other than his love may still bear children by a male as long as he is virile, but his love is the only one who he is expected to take care of, I believe they're called a wife in your society" Nepenthe replies. You slowly nod, it made sense, you weren't sure if you agreed with it but it made sense. Nepenthe opens her mouth again as if to speak
1553322222222222222221.title: Nepenthe the Phoenix

15533222222222222222212.content:
For a second, you thought you had misheard Nepenthe. “What was that?” You say. Nepenthe doesn’t answer. Instead, she places you on the floor and motions for you to step back. “Do not be alarmed by what you are about to see.” She says. “It is perfectly natural.” You take several steps backwards, you still have no idea what she is talking about. Suddenly, you can make out smoke rising up from underneath Nepenthe’s dress. “Nepenthe! You’re…!” You begin, but Nepenthe raises a hand to silence you. “I told you.” She says. “I’ll be fine.”


In less time than it takes for you to blink, Nepenthe bursts into flames! You gasp loudly as bright red fire instantly covers her entire body. But there was something strange about this whole situation, other than Nepenthe spontaneously combusting. For one thing, she didn’t seem to be in any pain. She just sat there in her throne, a calm expression on her face. Instead of the smell of something burning, the room quickly filled with the aroma of fresh roses and lilac. But strangest of all was the guards. They didn’t looked panicked at all. They stood at their posts, staring at the sight of their ruler burning alive as though it were a normal thing.


Nepenthe stands from her throne, still burning, and stands in the center of the room, a living tower of flames. In about a minute, where Nepenthe once stood now sits a massive pile of ashes. For a second or two, you stand there staring at the great heap of soot, stunned by the spectacle you have just witnessed. Finally, you regain enough of you senses to blurt out, “What the hell was that!?”


All the guards in the room approach the ashes as begin digging through them, searching for something. One of them, a tabby cat, who introduces herself as Samantha, explains what just happened. “I’m sorry you had to see that so suddenly without an explanation.” she says. “You see, Empress Nepenthe has ruled Anthronia since our civilization’s beginning. As a phoenix, when her life nears it’s end, she bursts into flames as you just saw, and is reborn from the ashes.” As she says this, one of the guards digging through the ashes calls out, “I found her!”


The guard, a female wolf, emerges from the ash pile, carrying a small chick that looks as though it had just broken through it’s egg. You have to admit, that Nepenthe was much more beautiful as an adult. In her newborn state, she has no plumage, and is rather hard no look at. But you know you had better keep that thought to yourself.


“So what happens now?” You ask Samantha. “ Nepenthe has no heirs.” She says. “She normally selects someone to rule in her place until she grows up again, but she failed to do so this time.” She turns to face you. “So, as her advisor, the responsibility falls to you.” Once again, you think you think you had misheard her. “Come again?” You ask.


“It is the law that should the empress fail to choose a successor, the royal advisor shall be ruler for the time being.” Samantha explains. “But I’ve never had such responsibility, much less so suddenly!” You say. “I don’t know anything about ruling a nation!” Samantha shrugs. “So it was with all of Nepenthe’s previous replacements. Alternatively, you could choose someone else to rule in your place. It’s your choice.”


“How long does it take for Nepenthe to become fully grown again?” You ask. “About a decade.” Says Samantha. “Give or take a year or two.” This is a huge weight that has so suddenly befallen you. Ruling your own nation does sound rather tempting, even if it is only temporary. On the other hand, you’re not sure you would be up to the job.


So, what will it be?
15533222222222222222212.title: Phoenix Reborn

155332222222222222222122.content:
"I-I'm sorry" you say hanging you head a bit as you spoke "I just can't accept this kind of responsibility so quickly, I haven't even been here a day, I just don't know enough about you and your people" you continue.

Samantha sighs but nods "I was expecting you to say something like that, very well since let's go and figure out who Nephente's successor is going to be" she says.

Samantha turns and starts quickly walking towards the great doors at the end of the throne room, you quickly follow her, the sound of the guards cooing and fawning over the infantile Nephente behind you growing more and more distant. The sounds of the group were nearly gone until out of nowhere an ear-piercing wail started up behind you startling both you and Samantha. You turned to see Nephente thrashing and wailing like she had just been stung by a bee, the wolf guard as well as the others were having a tough time holding her still. You and Samantha quickly ran back to the group of guards.

"What happened?" you ask concern quite evident in your voice.

"We don't know, she just started crying and thrashing" the guard replies grabbing onto one of Nephente's flailing limbs.

"Empress please settle down, it's alright" Samantha says.

"Nephente please stop crying" you say turning your attention to her small thrashing form. Near instantly she stops crying and thrashing, You as well as everyone else give off a small sigh of relief as she settled down, so you turned and started to walk back towards the doors.

You made it a foot before you felt someone grab your shoulder and you turned to see Samantha staring at you, "where are you going, didn't you just see what happened?" she says.

"Yeah Nephente stopped crying, now we can go choose her successor" you reply.

Samantha gives off a soft sigh and turns toward the wolf guard "Ila would you please hand him the empress" she says. Ila eyed you for a second before sighing and reaching out her arms. You slowly and carefully take Nephente from her and the effect is near instant, Nephente gives of a soft contented sigh and cuddles herself into the crux of your arm her head laying on your arm as she near-instantly falls asleep as you hold her. Ila gave off a sharp gasp and you turned to see Samantha smiling softly at you, "it looks like Empress Nephente has taken quite a liking to you, good thing you didn't want to be emperor as now you can't, you're going to be taking care of the Empress as she grows up" she says matter-of-factly.

"W-wait, I can't take care of her, I've never raised a kid, besides you said she's going to grow back to normal during those ten years"

"Yes, she'll grow about an inch a day and should mature mentally about 2 years for each of the next 10 years" Samantha replies.

Doing some mental math you froze as you made a realization "how am I supposed to control a 90ft tall 6 year old?" you ask.

"You won't be taking care of her alone, all of us will be there to help you, after we find the next successor for Nephente of course, so for now you and Ila are in charge of her majesty" Samantha says before turning and walking away. You just stood there stunned as Samantha and the 13 other guards walked away, turning as you felt a light tap on your shoulder.

"We need to leave" Ila says leading you to the wall behind Nephente's throne, she pushes against one of the panels and it moves backwards a foot allowing her to slide it to the side into an alcove, revealing a secret passage. You honestly weren't surprised at the moment as this was easily the most tame thing you had seen today, Ila motions for you to walk forward allowing her to seal the passage back up behind the two of you. You heard rather then saw her grab a torch from the wall and ignite it, thankfully the sudden sound nor the light woke Nephente up. Ila took the lead position as the two of you walked along the passage.

"So, how long has Nephente, been doing this?" you ask.

"Centuries" Ila replies "we believe her body to maintain her immortality must revert back to childhood so she can basically rest and rejuvenate, without all the worries of the island and it's people."

"Does, does she remember everything?" you ask.

"We believe she does, although when she actually matures back to normal is anyone's guess" Ila says turning and sweeping the torch ahead as she saw some cobwebs.

"Where exactly are we going to live, Nephente is going to be 150ft tall in 5 years" you say.

"Don't worry about it, that's actually the reason why we only live on one half of the island, the other half is covered by a set of houses for Nephente and her caretakers to live in while she grows back up, there's one for 50, 100, 150, 200, 250 and finally 300ft, the last house is mainly used inn the final days before she goes back to being Empress, sort of like a vacation house" Ila replies.

"You're really calm about this" you say eying Ila, it was strange, you were mentally freaking out while she was acting like this was nothing more than a simple walk in the park.

"Well, most of the guards were told about this, and we were trained from birth for this day to come" Ila says. You couldn't do much else but nod as it made sense, if you were going to suddenly burst into flames to be reborn as a baby, you'd tell someone about it and make other preparations. Although that made you wonder why Nephente hadn't named a successor, but then again maybe she didn't have control over when she became a living pyre and it caught her off guard. Finally the tunnel opened up revealing an expansive jungle with what looked like no more than an animal trail snaking through the trees. Ila snuffed out the torch and threw it to the side before pulling out a sword and starting to proceed down the trail. You followed closely behind, not wanting to get lost as she was your guide, that and you were carrying Nephente.

It took the two of you a couple of minutes to reach a clearing. Ila kept moving as she breached the trees, but you froze on the spot. Standing in front of you was a simple log cabin, single wooden door, two small windows windows on either side and a simple chimney, this had to be the first cabin Ila was talking about, but the sheer enormity of the structure still blew you away. Ila turned and you heard her loudly sigh before gently grabbing onto your shoulder and pulling you towards the giant cabin, "Nephente's homes needed to be this large as she can always grow into them, but she can't become smaller" Ila says pulling you towards the door. She lets you go long enough to open up a smaller door set in the frame of the much larger one and issues you inside closing the door behind you. Nephente chose this exact moment to wake up, her eyes scanning the enormous entrance area you found yourselves in, sadly she also chose this time once she was finished to start crying. Ila stared at you for a second, however since she didn't calm down you knew she wasn't worried that you weren't there.

"What do you think she wants?"

1553322222222222222222.title: Riddle Me This

15533222222222222222221.content:
On the massive marble throne in front of you, sits a gigantic anthro sphinx. She has the body of a humanoid lioness, while her face seems vaguely human. She had yellow eyes with slits for pupils, fur, a feline nose and round ears. The rest of her face was human-like.


She smiled at you, showing her long white fangs. “Step closer.” She said. You timidly approach her throne, staring up at her. She wore a long white gown with a golden headdress like an Egyptian pharoh.


“My name is Mirage.” She says in a almost purring voice. “You are an outsider, are you not?” You nod. “Well then, it is up to me to decide your fate.”


You gulp. “How will you do that?” You ask. “Simple.” Says Mirage, grinning. “We sphinx’s love to play riddle games. So, I shall ask you a riddle. If you answer correctly, then you may be allowed to stay here.


“And if I get it wrong?” You ask, fearing the answer. Mirage grins. She opens her mouth and snaps it shut. You turn and try to run for the doors, but the two guards that brought you here quickly grab your arms, preventing you from escaping.


“Now now.” Say Mirage. “Even if you could escape, where would you go? This island is surrounded by ocean, outside this city is nothing but jungle, and outside this room the palace is swarming with my guards. You wouldn’t even make it to the front doors. Now, will you take your test, or shall I have a snack?”


“Fine.” You say, sighing. “I’ll play you game.” Mirage grins. “Excellent!” She asks you a riddle.


"I never was, am always to be,
No one ever saw me, nor ever will
And yet I am the confidence of all
To live and breathe on this terrestrial ball.
What am I?”
15533222222222222222221.title: Mirage the Sphinx

info.brief_description: You are stranded on an island with anthro amazons, ruled by a giantess
info.description:
(5/23/2016: Under new management. This is not originally mine)

Your boat is caught in a violent storm and you are thrown overboard. You wash up on an island, populated by anthro amazons. The amazons are ruled by their empress, a giantess anthro. Where the story goes, depends on who that anthro is.

Some rules:

1. The main character can be eaten, just no digesting.

2.There are now more than enough options for an empress, so no more adding any new ones.

3. Write at least 2 to 3 paragraphs per chapter

4. Most of the amazons are ten feet tall, there there are a few that are bigger. The empress is always the biggest.

5. In most storylines, the males of the island are either slaves, hiding in the jungle, or non-existent. If there are males inhabiting the city, as citizens or not, make it evident early in the storyline

6. Sorry to any females reading this, but the main character is always male

7. No explicit sexual content. This isn't another fetish story, I want it to have actual plot. You can imply it, but don't graphically describe it.

8. Have fun!

As you read the story, you may have some questions as to certain elements of the story, such as why humans haven’t found the island, or why the anthros speak English. Some of them may be answered in the storylines, but if you haven’t read them, then just remember the MST3K theme song. Just repeat to yourself “It’s just a story, I should really just relax.”

By the way, the official name of the island is “Anthronia”. Any other name for it appearing in the story is either incorrect or a misspelling.


And also, another writer by the name of "Falcon" has posted a copy of this story titled "Island of the Furries". This version has all the anthros at normal human height, and includes the characters of Eric W Schwartz. It's rather amusing to me really. Here's a link.

http://www.writing.com/main/interact/item_id/1764611-Island-of-the-Furries


That's all for now. Enjoy!
